GSD36mvir_sau:2283: ekādaśī yadā luptā parato dvādaśī bhavet /
GSD36mvir_sau:2284: upoṣyā dvādaśī tatra yadīcchet paramāṃ gatim //
GSD36mvir_sau:2292: evaṃ ca vaiṣṇavasya putrādayo 'vaiṣṇavāścenna tān pratyayaṃ nirṇaya iti dhyeyam /
GSD36mvir_sau:2293: atra ca viddhāniṣedhaḥ saṃyogapṛthaktvanyāyena vratārthaḥ puruṣārthaśca /
GSD36mvir_sau:2303: kṛcchrapādaṃ naraścīrtvā gāṃ ca dadyāt savatsikām /
GSD36mvir_sau:2306: tattvaṃ tu“aṅge phalaśrutirarthavāda“iti nyāyena kratvarthaniṣedhātikrame narakādiśravaṇaṃ nindārthavāda eva /
GSD36mvir_sau:2310: tatra śuddhābhedena dvividhāpi ekādaśī pratyekaṃ navavidhā /
GSD36mvir_sau:2311: śuddhā viddhā tathā tredhā bhinnā nyūnasamādhikaiḥ /
GSD36mvir_sau:2315: dvitīyasūryodayāvyavahitaprākkṣaṇe samāptā samā tato 'rvāksamāptānyūnā udayotta rabhāvinī adhikā /
GSD36mvir_sau:2319: te ca śuddhanyūnanyūnadvādaśikā 1 śuddhanyūnasamadvādaśikā 2 śuddhanyūnādhikadvādaśikā 3 śuddhasamanyūnadvādaśikā 4 śuddhasamasamadvādaśikā 5 śuddhasamādhikadvādaśikā 6
GSD36mvir_sau:2320: śuddhādhikanyūnadvādaśikā 7 śuddhādhikasamadvādaśikā 8 śuddhādhikādhikadvādaśikā 9 evaṃ viddhāyāmapītyaṣṭādaśa bhedāḥ /
GSD36mvir_sau:2326: apare 'hani śeṣāḥ syuḥ saptamī tu vyavasthayā //
GSD36mvir_sau:2328: mādhavastvaṣṭau bhedānāha--śuddhānadhikānadhikadvādaśikā 1 śuddhānadhikādhikadvādaśikā 2 śuddhādhikādhikadvādaśikā 3 śuddhādhikānadhikadvādaśikā 4 evaṃ viddhāpi /
GSD36mvir_sau:2331: tatra prathame pakṣe sandeha eva nāsti /
GSD36mvir_sau:2333: śuddhā yadā samā hīnā samā hīnādhikottarā /
GSD36mvir_sau:2340: ekādaśī bhavet pūrṇā parato dvādaśī yadi /
GSD36mvir_sau:2347: hemādristu asmin dvitīye pakṣe śuddhaikādaśyupavāsavidhāyakānāṃ vacanānāṃ gṛhasthaviṣayakatvaṃ śuddhadvādaśyupavāsavidhāyakānāṃ tu yativiṣayatvam /
GSD36mvir_sau:2350: na garbhe viśate janturityāha bhagavān hariḥ /
GSD36mvir_sau:2352: atra ca na garbhe viśate janturityato yatipratīterityāha /
GSD36mvir_sau:2355: dvādaśī ca trayodaśyāmasti tatra kathaṃ bhavet //
GSD36mvir_sau:2365: dvādaśyāṃ ca tathā tāta! dṛśyate punareva sā //
GSD36mvir_sau:2373: vidhavāyāśca tatreva parato dvādaśī na cet /
GSD36mvir_sau:2381: na ca prāgudāhṛtavacanānusārāt sakāmaniṣkāmapadaṃ gṛhiyatiparamastviti vācyam /
GSD36mvir_sau:2383: prātarbhavatu vā mā vā dvādaśī ca dvijottama! //
GSD36mvir_sau:2385: viṣṇuprītikāmanāyāṃ tu etādṛśe viṣaye dinadvaye 'pyupavāsaḥ kāryaḥ /
GSD36mvir_sau:2387: trayodasī uṣaḥ kāle upoṣyā tatra kābhavet //
GSD36mvir_sau:2390: kecittu dve upoṣye ityanena naikasyopavāsasya āvṛtyā vidhānaṃ kintu kaiścitpūrvā kaiściduttareti tithidvayopoṣyatvapratipādanaparaṃ pūrvaikavākyatvādityāhuḥ /
GSD36mvir_sau:2395: ekādaśī na labhyate dvādaśī sakalā bhavet /
GSD36mvir_sau:2398: atra ca viddhāyā anādhikyaṃ sāmyena kṣayeṇa ca bhavati /
GSD36mvir_sau:2402: tasya putrā vinaśyanti maghāyāṃ piṇḍado yathā //
GSD36mvir_sau:2410: upoṣyā dvādaśī śuddhā trayodaśryāṃ ca pāraṇam //
GSD36mvir_sau:2412: atraca dinakṣaye viddhāniṣedhasya putravadviṣayatvāt dvādaśyupavāso 'pi tadviṣaya eveti dhyeyam /
GSD36mvir_sau:2413: sāmyena anādhikye tu putra vatāmapi pūrvatraiva“dinakṣaya“ityādinā kṣaya evaiteṣāṃ viddhopavāsaparyudāsāt /
GSD36mvir_sau:2415: ekādaśī kalāpyekā parato na ca varddhate /
GSD36mvir_sau:2420: daśamīmiśritā pūrvā pūrṇā ca dvādaśī parā /
GSD36mvir_sau:2427: iti sumantuvacanaṃ tat kṣayaśabdena vṛddhyabhāvalakṣaṇayā sāmyaparameva vyākhyeyam /
GSD36mvir_sau:2429: na caitadvacanānurodhāt pādmasyaiva lakṣaṇayā sāmyaparatvamastviti vācyam /
GSD36mvir_sau:2431: madanaratnastu sāmye kṣaye ca yatīnāṃ paraiva pūrvodāhṛtasumantuviṣṇurahasyavacanābhyām /
GSD36mvir_sau:2444: ekādaśī yadā luptā parato dvādaśī bhavet /
GSD36mvir_sau:2449: ityuttarārddhaṃ paṭhitvā śuklapakṣe daśamīviddhā tyājyā kṛṣṇapakṣe tu daśamīviddhā grāhyetyāhuḥ /
GSD36mvir_sau:2451: kimatra viddhāniṣedhaḥ śuklapakṣa eveti vidhīyate kiṃ vā viddhāvidhiḥ kṛṣṇapakṣa eveti /
GSD36mvir_sau:2457: prātarbhavatu vā mā vā yato nityamupoṣaṇam //
GSD36mvir_sau:2458: iti vacanaṃ prātastrayodaśīdine dvādaśī bhadhatu vā mā veti vyākhyāya trayodaśryāṃ dvādaśīsattve 'pi viddhāyāmevopavāsa ityuktam /
GSD36mvir_sau:2463: daśamīvedhe prātaḥ saṅkalpakāle ekādaśī bhavatu vā mā vā sarvathopavāsaḥ kartavya eveti /
GSD36mvir_sau:2464: vastutastu hemādṣādau“dvādaśīmiśritā naraiḥ“ityeva vākyamudāhṛtamiti na kaściddoṣaḥ /
GSD36mvir_sau:2465: yā tu viddhādhikādhikadvādaśikā sā sarveṣāṃ paraiva viddhāniṣedhavākyānāṃ niraṅkuśaṃ tatraiva pravṛtteḥ /
GSD36mvir_sau:2466: yā tu viddhādhikānadhikadvādaśikā sā sarvairapi paraivopoṣyā /
GSD36mvir_sau:2468: dvādaśī ca trayodaśyāṃ vidyate yadi vā navā //
GSD36mvir_sau:2471: tatra kratuśataṃ puṇyaṃ trayodaśyāṃ ca pāraṇam //
GSD36mvir_sau:2473: asmiṃśca kṣayeṇa dvādaśyā anādhikye kaurmokteḥ putravadgṛhasthairnopavāsaḥ kāryaḥ /
GSD36mvir_sau:2479: ekādaśī yadā vṛddhā dbādaśī ca kṣayaṃ gatā /
GSD36mvir_sau:2480: kṣīṇā sā dvādaśī jñeyā naktaṃ tatra vidhīyate //
GSD36mvir_sau:2490: atra ca yeṣu pakṣeṣu viddhopavāsaprasaktistatra rātrau pūjāvratasaṅkalpāvanuṣṭheyau /
GSD36mvir_sau:2494_0: yeṣu tu śuddhopavāsaprasaktistatra yadi pūrvadine madhyarātrāt pūrvaṃ daśamī tadā“prātaḥ
GSD36mvir_sau:2495: yadā tu madhyarātrottaraṃ daśamyā vedhastadā madhyāhnottaraṃ pūjāvratasaṅkalpā vanuṣṭheyau /
GSD36mvir_sau:2500: ardharātrāt parā yatra ekādaśyāṃ tu labhyate /
GSD36mvir_sau:2505: anye tu kapālavedhasyāpi aruṇodayavedhavannityavadeva dūṣakatvam asmād vacanāt /
GSD36mvir_sau:2517: yadā bhavati alpā tu dvādaśī pāraṇādine /
GSD36mvir_sau:2520: na coṣaḥkālasyālpatvāt kathaṃ tāvat karmānuṣṭheyamiti vācyam /
GSD36mvir_sau:2526: apakarṣaśca smārttasyaiva na śrautasya tato balīyastvāt /
GSD36mvir_sau:2529: atra ca prātarmādhyāhnikagrahaṇānna naimittikasaṅkrāntivyatīpātādiyuktasya tattatkāle vihitasya snānādikarmaṇaḥ sāṃvatsarikādervāpakarṣaḥ /
GSD36mvir_sau:2530: evaṃ bhūyasyāmapi dvādaśryāṃ mādhyāhnikāpakarṣaḥ prātaḥ kārya eva /
GSD36mvir_sau:2533: yadā tu prātaḥkālo dvādaśīprathamapādāntargato bhavati tadā tadante pāraṇā kāryā /
GSD36mvir_sau:2540: sā tu ekādaśīyuktā grāhyā“rudreṇa dvādaśī yuktā“iti yugmavacanāt /
GSD36mvir_sau:2541: dvādaśī ca prakartavyā ekādaśyā yutā prabho! /
GSD36mvir_sau:2549: yadā caikādaśyupavāsadvādaśyupavāsayorekasmin dine prasaktistadopavāsadvayamapi tantreṇa kāryam /
GSD36mvir_sau:2550: yadā tu sampūrṇayostithyorbhedenopavāsadvayaprasaktistadā ekādaśyupavāsasaṃyuktāṃ pāraṇāṃ jalena kṛtvā dvādaśīvratamārabheteti mādhavaḥ /
GSD36mvir_sau:2551: ayameva ca nyāyaḥ sarvatra upavāsadvayaprasaktau dhyeyaḥ /
GSD36mvir_sau:2556: pāraṇāhe na labhyeta dvādaśī ghaṭikāpi cet /
GSD36mvir_sau:2560: śrāvaṇasya site pakṣe karkasthe ca divākare /
GSD36mvir_sau:2565: yā rāma! śravaṇopetā dvādasī mahatī tu sā /
GSD36mvir_sau:2570: dvikalo yadi labhyeta sa jñeyo hyāṣṭayāmikaḥ //
GSD36mvir_sau:2573: tatra yā tāvadekasminneva dine śravaṇayogavatī śuddhā śuddhādhikā vā viddhā viddhādhikā vā tasyāṃ sandeha eva nāsti /
GSD36mvir_sau:2574: yadā viddhādhikāyāṃ dinadvaye 'pi śravaṇayogastadā ekādaśīyutā grāhyā /
GSD36mvir_sau:2585: yadā tu dvādaśyāṃ śravaṇayoga eva nāsti tadā ekādaśyāmeva tadvatyāṃ śravaṇadvādaśīvrataṃ kāryam /
GSD36mvir_sau:2586: yadā na prāpyate ṛkṣaṃ dvādaśyāṃ śravaṇaḥ kvacit /
GSD36mvir_sau:2592: vijayā sā tithiḥ proktā bhaktānāṃ vijayapradā //
GSD36mvir_sau:2594: viddhādhikye 'pi cottaradine śravaṇayogābhāve tādṛśī daśamīviddhāpi grāhyā /
GSD36mvir_sau:2599: yadā caikādaśīśravaṇadvādaśyupavāsau dinabhedena prāpnutastadā śaktena dvayamapi kāryam /
GSD36mvir_sau:2604: dvādaśyāṃ śuklapakṣe tu nakṣatraṃ śravaṇaṃ yadi /
GSD36mvir_sau:2611: atra ca yadā kadācicchravaṇayoge 'pi prātareva saṅkalpa iti hemādriḥ /
GSD36mvir_sau:2614: mahatī nāma sā jñeyā upavāse mahāphalā //
GSD36mvir_sau:2620: śravaṇadvādaśīvratanimittopavāsapāraṇaṃ tu pāraṇādine ubhayānuvṛttau tūbhayānte kartavyamiti mukhyaḥ kalpaḥ /
GSD36mvir_sau:2623: pāraṇaṃ tu na kartavyaṃ yāvannaikasya saṅkṣayaḥ //
GSD36mvir_sau:2625: madanaratnastu atra yadyapi tithinakṣatrayoranyatarānte pāraṇaṃ pratīyate tathāpi tithyanta eva kāryam na tu tithimadhye 'pi nakṣatramātrānte /
GSD36mvir_sau:2635: jayā ca vijayā caiva jayantī pāpanāśinī //
GSD36mvir_sau:2639: ekādaśī tu sampūrṇā varddhate punareva sā //
GSD36mvir_sau:2644: ante trayodaśī bhadrā trispṛśā sā prakīrttitā //
GSD36mvir_sau:2655: atra ca tithiprayuktāsu na ko 'pi vicāraḥ /
GSD36mvir_sau:2658: itarāsu nakṣatraprayuktāsu tu na śravaṇadbādaśīvadalpayoge 'pi pūjyatvaṃ kintu sūryodayādārabhya punastatparyantamastamayaparyantaṃ vā sattva eva /
GSD36mvir_sau:2663: etāścāṣṭau mahādvādaśyaḥ kāmyāḥ mahāpuṇyā ityādinā phalaśravaṇāt /
GSD36mvir_sau:2665: na kariṣyanti ye loke dvādaśyo 'ṣṭau mamājñayā /
GSD36mvir_sau:2685: dvitīyā pañcamī vedhāt daśamī ca trayodaśī /
GSD36mvir_sau:2690: yadā tu paradine trayodaśī nāsti tadā pūrvaviddhā kāryā /
GSD36mvir_sau:2693: ekādaśī tṛtīyā ca ṣaṣṭhī caiva trayodaśī /
GSD36mvir_sau:2694: pūrvaviddhāpi kartavyā yadi na syāt pare 'hani //
GSD36mvir_sau:2703: dvitīyā pañcamī vedhāt daśamī ca trayodaśī /
GSD36mvir_sau:2707: atra ca pūrvaviddhāyā grāhyatvaṃ na sāyāhnamātravyāpitve kintu aparāṅṇavyāpitve /
GSD36mvir_sau:2720: tatastu lohite bhānau snātvā saniyamo vratī /
GSD36mvir_sau:2723: dinadvaye pradoṣavyāpitve tadekadeśasparśe vā uttarā grāhyā /
GSD36mvir_sau:2736: yadyāpi cātra sāmānyanirṇayādaparāhṇavyāpinī pūrvaviddhā prāpyate tathāpi--
GSD36mvir_sau:2739: iti saṃvartavacanāt sāyānhavyāpinyā api pūrvaviddhāyā grahaṇam /
GSD36mvir_sau:2740: anyathā hi sāmānyanirṇayādeva prāpteretasya vacanasya nirarthakatvāpatteḥ /
GSD36mvir_sau:2749: śuklā caturdaśī grāhyā paraviddhā sadā vrate /
GSD36mvir_sau:2753: etāḥ parayutāḥ kāryāḥ parāḥ pūrveṇa saṃyutāḥ //
GSD36mvir_sau:2756: sadā kāryā trayodaśyā na tu yuktā caturdaśī /
GSD36mvir_sau:2764: ekādaśī daśamyā tu saptamyā cāṣṭamī tathā /
GSD36mvir_sau:2765: pañcamyā ca yadā ṣaṣṭhī trayodaśyā caturdaśī //
GSD36mvir_sau:2766: āsu kriyā na kurvīta pūrvaviddhāsu mānavaḥ /
GSD36mvir_sau:2775: madhoḥ śrāvaṇamāsasya śuklā yā tu caturdaśī /
GSD36mvir_sau:2779: niśi bhramanti bhūtāni śaktayaḥ śūlabhṛt! yataḥ /
GSD36mvir_sau:2792: dadarśa śīlā sā strīṇāṃ samūhaṃ raktavāsasām //
GSD36mvir_sau:2799: “daive hyaudayikī grāhyā“iti pratyakṣavacanavirodhāt audayikī grāhyā na madhyāhnagateti saṅkṣepaḥ /
GSD36mvir_sau:2804: pūrvaviddhā tu kartavyā paraviddhā na karhicit //
GSD36mvir_sau:2814: amāvāsyā tṛtīyā ca tā upoṣyāḥ parānvitāḥ //
GSD36mvir_sau:2817: śivavrate tu pakṣadvayagate caturdaśyau trayodaśīyute aparāhṇavyāpinyau grāhye /
GSD36mvir_sau:2820: caturdaśī tu kartavyā trayodaśyā yutā vibho! /
GSD36mvir_sau:2830: pūrvaviddhā tu kartavyā paraviddhā na karhicit //
GSD36mvir_sau:2834: taditaravrateṣu“ubhe pakṣe caturdaśī“iti prāgudāhṛtapadmapurāṇāt tādṛśavṛddhavaśiṣṭhavacanācca uttaraviddhā grāhyeti /
GSD36mvir_sau:2841: varṣe barṣe tu kartavyaṃ mama santuṣṭikāraṇam //
GSD36mvir_sau:2842: dinadvaye tadvyāptau aṃśataḥ samavyāptau vā paraiva /
GSD36mvir_sau:2845: paradine gauṇavyāpteḥ sattvāt pūrvadine ca tadabhāvāt /
GSD36mvir_sau:2851: tat saṅkalparūpavratopakramaviṣayaṃ na tu pradhānasya madhyāhnakālatvajñāpakam /
GSD36mvir_sau:2867: vārāho girijāsute nabhasi yadbhūte site mādhave //
GSD36mvir_sau:2869: siṃho bhādrapade site haritithau śrīvāmano mādhave
GSD36mvir_sau:2879: jyeṣṭhaśuklacaturdaśyāṃ sarvasmin dine pañcāgnisādhanaṃ kṛtvā pradoṣe hemadhenurdeyā /
GSD36mvir_sau:2888: atra dinodaya iti śravaṇāt prātaḥkālavyāptitvamiti gauḍāḥ /
GSD36mvir_sau:2909: varṣe ca hemalambākhye māse śrīmati kārttike /
GSD36mvir_sau:2919: rājā ca tatra sampūjyo yamaḥ pralayabhāskaraḥ /
GSD36mvir_sau:2926: atra ca rātriśabdastithilakṣakaḥ sivaśabdaśca śivavratalakṣakaḥ prakaraṇāt /
GSD36mvir_sau:2959: prabhāte vimale jāte dṛṣṭvā tatraiva śaṅkaram /
GSD36mvir_sau:2972: jāgaraṃ kurute tatra sa rudrasamatāṃ vrajet //
GSD36mvir_sau:2974: tadetat śivarātrivrataṃ janmāṣṭamīvat saṃyogamapṛthaktvanyāyena nityaṃ kāmyaṃ ca tatra nityatvaṃ tāvat skandapūrāṇe--
GSD36mvir_sau:2979: varṣe varṣe mahādevi! naro nārī pativratā /
GSD36mvir_sau:2982: arṇavo yadi vā śuṣyet kṣīyeta himavānapi /
GSD36mvir_sau:2989: śivaṃ ca pūjayitvā yo jāgartti ca caturdaśīm /
GSD36mvir_sau:2995: sarvān bhuktvā tato bhogān mṛto bhūpo 'bhijāyate //
GSD36mvir_sau:2999: sarvān kāmānavāpnoti pretya ceha ca mānavaḥ /
GSD36mvir_sau:3006: mādhamāse tu yā kṛṣṇā phālgunādau caturdaśī /
GSD36mvir_sau:3011: anyathā yo dadātīha sa dātā narakaṃ vrajet //
GSD36mvir_sau:3017: ata evātra vedho 'pi na divāvedha eva kintu janmāṣṭamīvadrātrivedho 'pi bhavatyeva /
GSD36mvir_sau:3022: bhūtāni śaktayo yoginyo 'pi śūlabhṛcchaṅkaraśca yato rātrau bhramanti ataḥ satyāṃ tasyāṃ pūjanaṃ bhavediti hemādriḥ /
GSD36mvir_sau:3024: yadā dinadvaye niśīthavyāpinī tadā pūrvaiva grāhyā /
GSD36mvir_sau:3033: śrāvaṇī durganavamī tathā dūrvāṣṭamī tu yā /
GSD36mvir_sau:3037: anaṅgena samāyuktā kartavyā sā sadā tithiḥ /
GSD36mvir_sau:3045: bhūtaviddhā ca yā tatra śivarātrivrataṃ caret //
GSD36mvir_sau:3051: atra rātrau jāgaraṇaṃ yasmāditi hetuvaśāt pradoṣaśabdo rātriparo 'vagantavyaḥ /
GSD36mvir_sau:3061: yadā tu niśīthādūrdhvagā trayodaśī pera'hani ca niśīthāvyāpinyapi caturdaśī bhavati tadā paraiva grāhyā /
GSD36mvir_sau:3064: māghāsite bhūtadinaṃ hi rājannupaiti yogaṃ yadi pañcadaśyā /
GSD36mvir_sau:3065: jayāprayuktāṃ na tu jātu kuryācchivasya rātriṃ priyakṛcchivasya //
GSD36mvir_sau:3067: jayāprayuktāṃ jayayā trayodaśyā prakarṣeṇa niśīthādūrdhvaṃ yuktāṃ na kuryāt nopavaset kintu sakaladinabhūyorātrilābhāt parāmevetyarthaḥ /
GSD36mvir_sau:3068: tathāca yat śivarātrivrate bhūtāṃ kāmaviddhāṃ vivarjayet /
GSD36mvir_sau:3074: pūrvasyā eva niśīthavyāptau uttarāyā eva vā niśīthavyāptau tatkālavyāpinī grāhyetyuktam--
GSD36mvir_sau:3083: vyāptā sā dṛśyate yasyāṃ tasyāṃ kuryāt vrataṃ naraḥ //

GSD36mvir_sau:4886: mādhavastu tṛtīyapraharasya prathamaghaṭikā dvitīyasya cāntyetyevaṃ ghaṭikādvayamarddharātramityāha /
GSD36mvir_sau:4887: dinadvayaṃ ca na sampūrṇaṃ kintu arddhāvacchinnameva /
GSD36mvir_sau:4895: vastutastu etasya anantabhaṭṭena nirmūlatvasyoktatvāt hemādpyādivyākhyaiva jyāyasī bahusammatā ca /
GSD36mvir_sau:4896: tasmāt pūrṇe arddharātre saṅkrame pūrvadinottarārddhamuttaradinapūrvārddhaṃ ca puṇyaṃ sannidhānāt /
GSD36mvir_sau:4897: tadapi na samuccayena kintu vikalpena anyathā pradhānāvṛttyāpatteḥ,
GSD36mvir_sau:4898: so 'pi pūrvadinottarārddhavarttitithyā yadyabhinnā saṅkramakālīnā tithirbhavet tadā pūrvadinottarārddham,
GSD36mvir_sau:4899: yadā tu dvitīyadinapūrvārddhatithyā abhinnā tadottaradinapūrvārddhaṃ grāhyamityevaṃ vyavasthitaḥ /
GSD36mvir_sau:4905: arddharātrasaṅkrame yadi pūrvadinottarārddhe saṅkramakāle ca ekaiva tithirbhavet tadādau
GSD36mvir_sau:4909: ardharātrottaraṃ sakraṅme tu bhinnāyāmabhinnāyāṃ vā pūrvadinatithau pare 'hanyevetyuttarārdhārthaḥ /
GSD36mvir_sau:4910_0: yadā tu ardharātrasaṅkramakālīnā tithirdinadvayārdhayorapi bhavati tadā pūrvabhīginīṣu

GSD36mvir_sau:4926: iyaṃ ca rātrisaṅkramavyavasthā ayanabhinnaviṣayā pūrvodāhṛtavaśiṣṭhavacanena sakalasya rātrinirṇayasya ayane“muktvā makarakarkaṭau“iti paryudāsāt /
GSD36mvir_sau:4929: prabhāte vā niśīthe vā kuryādahani pūrvataḥ //
GSD36mvir_sau:4930: kārmukaṃ tu parityajya jñaṣaṃ saṅkramate raviḥ /
GSD36mvir_sau:4931: pradoṣe vārdharātre vā snānaṃ dānaṃ pare 'hani //
GSD36mvir_sau:4932: ityādibhaviṃṣyottaravacanānusārādarddharātratadūrdhvasaṅkrame 'pi karke 'hanyeva puṇyaṃ pūrvaṃ makare tu arddharātratadadhaḥsaṅkrame 'pi pare 'hanyeva /
GSD36mvir_sau:4933: evaṃ ca rātrisaṅkrame 'pi divāpuṇyatvavidhānādarthādrātrau snānādipratiṣedha unnīyate /
GSD36mvir_sau:4935: yathātraiva tāvadvaśiṣṭhavacane sarvasaṅkrāntisādhāraṇarātrisaṅkramaṇanimittakadivākartavyatvasyāyane--“muktvā makarakarkaṭau“iti paryudāsāttatra rātrāvapi kartavyatā /
GSD36mvir_sau:4948: itiparyudāso na sakalasya rātrinirṇayasya kintu sannihitasyārddharātrasaṅkramaṇanimittakasya dinadvayasyaiva /
GSD36mvir_sau:4950_0: yathā itarasaṅkrāntiṣu arddharātre jāyamānāsu dinadvayaṃ puṇyaṃ na tathā ayane tasmiṃstu
GSD36mvir_sau:4950_1: arddharātre jāyamāne pūrvodāhṛtabhaviṣyottaravacanānmakare uttaraṃ dinaṃ karke pūrvaṃ puṇyam /
GSD36mvir_sau:4951: bhaviṣyottaravākye hi na pradoṣa arddharātre vā jāyamānāyā makarasaṅkrānteḥ paradine puṇyaṃ prabhāte 'rddharātre vā jāyamānāyāḥ karkasaṅkrānteḥ pūrvadine puṇyamiti pratipādyate /
GSD36mvir_sau:4954: dinānte pañca nāḍyastu tadā puṇyatamāḥ smṛtāḥ //
GSD36mvir_sau:4955: udaye ca tathā pañca daive pitrye ca karmaṇi /
GSD36mvir_sau:4957: ataśca bhaviṣyottaravacanamevaṃ vyākhyeyam“pradoṣe vārddharātre vā“ityatra vāśabdau yathātathārthe“vopamānavikalpayoḥ“iti nighaṇṭusmaraṇāt /
GSD36mvir_sau:4959: yathā pradoṣe jāyamānāyā makarasaṅkrānteḥ pūrvadinārddhe puṇyaṃ tathā ardadharātre jāyamānāyāḥ pare 'hanīti /
GSD36mvir_sau:4961: ataścārddharātrasaṅkrame makare uttaraṃ dinaṃ karke pūrvam,
GSD36mvir_sau:4962: ardharātrādadhaḥ paścādvā saṅkrame tu ubhayatrāpi itarasaṅkrāntisarūpa eva nirṇayaḥ /
GSD36mvir_sau:4963: na caivaṃ rātripuṇyatvapratipādakānāṃ yājñavalkyādivacanānāṃ nirviṣayatvāpattiḥ sarvasaṅkrāntiṣu rātrisaṅkrame divaiva puṇyakālābhidhānāditivācyam /
GSD36mvir_sau:4967: prācyāstu rātrisannihitadinabhāgasaṅkrāntau ṣoḍaśaghaṭikādirūpavihitasamayena rātrerapi vyāvṛttatvā ttadviṣayatayā rātripuṇyatvavacanānāmupapattirityāhuḥ /
GSD36mvir_sau:4968: atra ca vihitaṃ snānaśrāddhadānādi niṣiddhaṃ ca yātrāmaithunādi anyato 'nusandheyam /
GSD36mvir_sau:4970: rave rāśisaṅkramavannakṣatrasaṅkrame grahāntarāṇāṃ ca rāśinakṣatrasaṅkrame snānādyanuṣṭhānam /
GSD36mvir_sau:4975: nāḍyaścatasraḥ sapalāḥ kujasya budhasya tisno manavaḥ palāni /
GSD36mvir_sau:4985: grahāntarasaṅkrame ca rātrau jāyamāne rātrāveva snānādi kāryaṃ ravisaṅkramavat
GSD36mvir_sau:4995: cāsaṅkrāntatvena saṅkrāntidvayavattvena ca bhavatīti dvedhāmalamāsaḥ adhikamāsaḥ kṣayamāsaśceti /
GSD36mvir_sau:4998: yasmin māse na saṅkrāntiḥ saṅkrāntidvayameva vā /
GSD36mvir_sau:4999: malamāsaḥ sa vijñeyo māsaḥ syāttu trayodaśaḥ //
GSD36mvir_sau:5016: indrāgnī yatra hūyete māsādiḥ sa prakīrttitaḥ /
GSD36mvir_sau:5019: ādyo malimluco jñeyo dvitīyaḥ prākṛtaḥ smṛtaḥ //
GSD36mvir_sau:5021: ādyadvitīyaśabdābhyāṃ tasyetaramāsāpekṣayā dvaiguṇyam uttaramāsasaṃjñatvaṃ ca sūcayati /
GSD36mvir_sau:5032: iti vyāsena mīnādisthe ravau pratipadādyalakṣaṇasambandhena caitrādilakṣaṇamuktam /
GSD36mvir_sau:5038: itibrahmaguptoktaṃ caitrādilakṣaṇaṃ tacchuddhamāsābhiprāyeṇa prāyikam na tu mukhyaṃ malamāsāvyāpakatvāt /
GSD36mvir_sau:5043: iti jyotiḥśāstre tasya nāmaśūnyatvoktiḥ sā viruddhamalimlucādināmakatvāt /
GSD36mvir_sau:5045: atha vā brahmaguptoktameva lakṣaṇaṃ mukhyaṃ na tu vyāsoktaṃ kṣaye 'sambhavāt /
GSD36mvir_sau:5046: adhikasya ca ṣaṣṭidinātmakatvāt tena ca meṣadisaṅkrāntisambhavāt /
GSD36mvir_sau:5063: iti pūrvādhimāsānantarametāvati kāle 'tīte sati dvitīyo 'dhimāso madhyamamānena bhavatītyasyārthaḥ /
GSD36mvir_sau:5064: atra ca vākye darśāntamāsavivakṣāyāṃ kṛṣṇadvitīyāyāṃ ghaṭikācatuṣṭaye gate 'dhimāsopakramaḥ prāpnoti /
GSD36mvir_sau:5068: ata evoktaṃ siddhāntaśiromaṇau, asaṅkrāntamāso 'dhimāsaḥ sphuṭaḥ syāditi /
GSD36mvir_sau:5072: yāni tu“māse triṃśattame bhavet“ityādivacanāni tāni sambhavābhiprāyeṇa na tu niyatāni vyabhicārasya sphuṭatvāt /
GSD36mvir_sau:5075: sa ca kārttikādiṣu triṣveva bhavati nānyeṣu /
GSD36mvir_sau:5076: yadā cāyaṃ tadā varṣamadhye kṣayamāsasyobhayato 'dhikamāsadvayaṃ bhavati /
GSD36mvir_sau:5078: kṣayaḥ kārttikāditraye nānyataḥ syāttadā varṣamadhye 'dhimāsadvayaṃ ca /
GSD36mvir_sau:5080: varṣaṃ cātra pūrvāsaṅkrāntādikaṃ cāndramāsadvādaśakaṃ na tu caitrādikam /

GSD36mvir_sau:5097: nandā = nava eṣāṃ prātilomyena pātaḥ / 974 ebhirmitairvarṣaiḥ pūrvaṃ kṣayo jāta ityarthaḥ /
GSD36mvir_sau:5118: yatra māsi ravisaṅkramadvayaṃ tatra māsayugalaṃ kṣayāhvayam /
GSD36mvir_sau:5120: ata eva pūrvasaṅkrāntyupalakṣitasya kārttikāderuttarasaṅkrāntyupalakṣitamārgaśīrṣādyapekṣayā pṛthagavasthānābhāvāt dvisaṅkrāntaḥ kṣaya ityucyate /
GSD36mvir_sau:5122: meṣādisthe savitari yo yo māsaḥ prapūryate cāndraḥ /
GSD36mvir_sau:5124: iti vacanoktalakṣaṇānusārāt kṣaye pūrvarāśisthe ravau darśāntyasamāptyabhāvāduttararāśistharavāveva tatsamāpteruttaramāsarūpatvamevetyāhuḥ /
GSD36mvir_sau:5127: yasmin māse na saṅkrāntiḥ saṅkrāntidvayameva ca /
GSD36mvir_sau:5130: atra pūrvāsaṅkrāntadvisaṅkrāntayoḥ saṃsarpaṃhaspatisaṃjñā uttarāsaṅkrāntatyādhimāsatvaṃ krameṇābhidhānādavagamyate iti madanaratnaḥ /
GSD36mvir_sau:5131: saṃsarpaśca na malamāsaḥ kintu śuddhaḥ uttarastvaśuddhaḥ /
GSD36mvir_sau:5136: yadāśvinādiṣaṭke malamāsa ekaḥ aparaśca caitrādiṣaṭke tadā pūrvasya śuddhatvapratipādakaṃ vacanāntaramapi--
GSD36mvir_sau:5141: makare vātha kumbhe vā nādhimāso vidhīyate //
GSD36mvir_sau:5145: daivaṃ pitryaṃ tadā karma tulāsthe karturakṣayam //
GSD36mvir_sau:5156: atra ca malamāsasya trayodaśatvaṃ saṅkrāntiyuktaśuddhadvādaśamāsāpekṣayā na tu vāstavam /
GSD36mvir_sau:5157: atra yadyapi sarvā ityupādānāt sarvakarmaṇāṃ nivṛttipratītistathāpi--
GSD36mvir_sau:5158: iṣṭyādi sarvaṃ kāmyaṃ tu malamāse vivarjayet /
GSD36mvir_sau:5161: ityādipratiprasavavacanebhyaśca kāmyānāmeva nivṛttiḥ na tu nityanaimittikānām /
GSD36mvir_sau:5180: eteṣāṃ ca nityatvamakaraṇe pratyavāyaśrava ṇādinā bodhyam /
GSD36mvir_sau:5182: darśapūrṇamāsādīnāṃ hi tattatkālāvacchinne jīvane nimitte vihitānāṃ malamāsa eva kālasamāptiḥ /
GSD36mvir_sau:5191: roge cālabhyayoge ca sīmante puṃsave 'pi vā /
GSD36mvir_sau:5193: idaṃ cātra kartavyatāvacanaṃ tannimittakasya snānādereva na tu kāmyasya“kāmyaṃ naiva kadācana“iti niṣedhāt /
GSD36mvir_sau:5221: gauḍāstu na nityapadenāvaśyakartavyapārvaṇaśrāddhādigrahaṇaṃ tathā sati pretaśrāddhāderapi tata eva kartavyatāsiddhau teṣāṃ pṛthaggrahaṇavaiyarthyāpatteḥ /
GSD36mvir_sau:5225: indrāgnī yatra hūyete māsādiḥ sa prakīrttitaḥ /
GSD36mvir_sau:5228: ādyo malimluco jñeyo dvitīyaḥ prākṛtaḥ smṛtaḥ //
GSD36mvir_sau:5243: vaśiṣṭhaḥ, saṃvatsaramadhye yadyadhimāso bhavet māsikārthaṃ dinamekaṃ vṛddhiṃ nayet /
GSD36mvir_sau:5245: yattvatra jīmūtavāhanenoktam-amāvāsyāmṛtasya tadadhikaraṇakaṃ māsikaṃ na māsavṛddhau varddhanīyaṃ“saṃvatsarātirekeṇa“iti pūrvodāhṛtakauthumivacanāditi, tanna /
GSD36mvir_sau:5246: asmin vacane māsikānupādānenaitasya tatparatve pramāṇābhāvāduktayuktyā pārvarṇaviṣayatvasyaiva yuktatvāt, /
GSD36mvir_sau:5262: astaṃ gate gurau śukre bāle vṛddhe malimluce /
GSD36mvir_sau:5264: iti gargavākyaṃ jātakarmādīnāṃ niṣedhakaṃ, tanmukhyakālākṛtānāṃ veditabyam /
GSD36mvir_sau:5267: atipāte tu kartavyaṃ praśaste māsi puṣyade //
GSD36mvir_sau:5274: paramānnaṃ tu yo dadyāt pitṝṇāṃ madhunā saha /
GSD36mvir_sau:5286: gajacchāyā tu sā proktā tatra śrāddhaṃ prakalpayet //
GSD36mvir_sau:5288: atra dākṣiṇātyamate gajacchāyādeḥ sagatitve 'pi vacanātkartavyatā bodhyā /
GSD36mvir_sau:5290: yāni tu sagatikāni tāni nityānyapi na tatra kāryāṇi /
GSD36mvir_sau:5299: tasyā naimittikatve 'pi śeṣivirodhānnimittānantarakālabādhe jāte parvopasaṅgrahavacchuddhakālopasaṅgrahasya nyāyyatvāt sagatikatvam /
GSD36mvir_sau:5303: kāmyānyapi yāni śeṣivirodhādvilambaṃ na sahante yathā kārīryādīni tāni malamāse 'pi bhavantyeva /
GSD36mvir_sau:5305: tathā tathaiva kāryāṇi na kālastu vidhīyate //
GSD36mvir_sau:5307: atra naimittikāni kāmyānīti sāmānādhikaraṇyam tathā ca duḥsvapnādinimittena kartavyatayopasthitāni kāmyānītyarthaḥ /
GSD36mvir_sau:5309: asūryo nāma ye māsā na teṣu mama sammatāḥ /
GSD36mvir_sau:5313: prārabdhaṃ karma yat kiñcit tat kāryaṃ syānmalimluce /
GSD36mvir_sau:5323: iti malamāse 'pi kāmyakarmaṇaḥ samāptipratipādakaṃ kāṭhakagṛhyaṃ tat sāvanamānopajīvikṛcchracāndrāyaṇāhīnasatrādiviṣayam /
GSD36mvir_sau:5328: yastu khamāpanamiti brahmasiddhāntavacane samāptiniṣedhaḥ sa malamāsa eva mohāt prārabdhasya tasya tatraiva samāpane doṣātiśayapradarśanārtha ityādda /
GSD36mvir_sau:5329: tadevaṃ saṅkṣepato varjyatve siddhe prapañcārthaṃ vacanānyudāhiyante /
GSD36mvir_sau:5334: bāle vā yadi vā śukre vṛddhe vāstamupāgate //
GSD36mvir_sau:5345: iti nāradavacena mahādānānāmeva pratiṣedhaḥ sa pratyavāyātiśayārthaḥ /
GSD36mvir_sau:5348: aste sandhyāgate bāle bhṛgau māsi malimluce /
GSD36mvir_sau:5353: anye tu śeṣibādhāpatteravaśyakartavye dānādāvanyeṣāmeva pratiprasavo na mahādānānāṃ teṣāṃ punarniṣedhādityāhuḥ /
GSD36mvir_sau:5354: nārāyaṇopādhyāyāstu dānāntarāṇi mumukṣoḥ phalābhisandhiviraheṇa kurvāṇasya malamāse 'pi bhavanti mahādānāni tu na tathā punarniṣedhādityāhuḥ /
GSD36mvir_sau:5363: kuryānna sāvakāśaṃ māṅgalyaṃ na tu viśeṣejyām //
GSD36mvir_sau:5365: atra sāvakāśamityanenaiva siddhe punarvivāhādigrahaṇaṃ nivakāśatve 'pi pratiṣedhārthamiti smārttaḥ /
GSD36mvir_sau:5370: vastutastu dvitīyādirapi malamāse niṣiddha eva sagatikatvāt /
GSD36mvir_sau:5377: atra hi pūrvārddhagatanindāpokṣito niṣedho na svatantraḥ kalpyaḥ /
GSD36mvir_sau:5387: ata eva tīrthayātrāṃ vivarjayediti gārgyavacane pāṭhaḥ /
GSD36mvir_sau:5393: na tyaktavyaṃ gayāśrāddhaṃ siṃhasthe ca bṛhaspatau /
GSD36mvir_sau:5396: malamāse na kartavyaṃ vyāghrasya vacanaṃ yathā /
GSD36mvir_sau:5398: tena vārṣikaṃ śrāddhaṃ malamāse na kāryamityeva vivakṣitam /
GSD36mvir_sau:5408: ityādiśātātapādivacanāni tāni malamāsamṛtānāṃ punarmalamāse tatraiva pratyāvdikaṃ kāryaṃ na śuddha ityevaṃparāṇi /
GSD36mvir_sau:5409: varṣe varṣe tu yacchrāddhaṃ mṛtāhe tanmalimluce /
GSD36mvir_sau:5412: malimluce tu samprāpte brāhmaṇo bhriyate yadi /
GSD36mvir_sau:5419: na cedaṃ vacanaṃ malamāsamṛtasya saureṇaiva māsena sarvadā pratyābdikakartavyatāparamiti samayaprakāśakṛdvyākhyānaṃ yuktam /
GSD36mvir_sau:5421: tasmānmalaṃmāsamṛtasya punarmalamāse tatraiva pratyābdikaṃ kāryaṃ na śuddha ityeva vyākhyā jyāyasī bahusammatā ca /
GSD36mvir_sau:5422: śuddhamāsamṛtānāṃ tu dvitīyādyābdikaṃ śuddha eva kāryaṃ prathamābdikaṃ tu mala eva /
GSD36mvir_sau:5429: ābdikaṃ prathamaṃ yat syāttat kurvīta malimluce /
GSD36mvir_sau:5433: punarābdikaṃ dvitīyādyābdikaṃ tu yadi taddine malamāsapātastadā trayodaśe śuddhe kurvītetyarthaḥ /
GSD36mvir_sau:5436: pratyabdaṃ dvādaśe māsi kāryā piṇḍakriyā sutaiḥ /
GSD36mvir_sau:5439: kvacid dvitīyābdikādau nalamāsapāte trayodaśe śuddhe kāryam /
GSD36mvir_sau:5440: ādyābdikaṃ malamāsapāte 'pi dvādaśa eva māse kāryamityarthaḥ /
GSD36mvir_sau:5441: iyaṃ ca malamāsapāte dvādaśe māsi kartavyatā na saṃvatsaramadhye malamāsapāte /
GSD36mvir_sau:5442: tathāca sati dvādaśe māsi mṛtatithyalābhena sapiṇḍanānupapatteḥ /
GSD36mvir_sau:5446: malamāsamṛtānāṃ yadā kālakrameṇa kadācinmṛtimāsa eva malamāsastadā tadīyamābdikaṃ tatraiva kāryam /
GSD36mvir_sau:5447: śuddhamāsamṛtānāṃ tu dvitīyādyābdikaṃ śuddha eva prathamābdikaṃ tu mala eveti /
GSD36mvir_sau:5452: yāni tu“māsadvaye 'pi tatkāryaṃ vyāghrasya vacanaṃ yathā“
GSD36mvir_sau:5459: tathaiva kāmyaṃ yat karma vatsarāt prathamādṛte //
GSD36mvir_sau:5462: atra cābhyudayaniṣedhadvārā tadaṅgakasya caulopanayanādereva niṣedho draṣṭabyaḥ /
GSD36mvir_sau:5465: kecittu prathamasamvatsare sapiṇḍīkaraṇottaradine kriyamāṇamābhyudayikaṃ malamāse 'pi kāryamityarthamāhuḥ /
GSD36mvir_sau:5467: tathā ca sapiṇḍīkaraṇādūrdhvaṃ yāni prathamasaṃvatsarasambandhīni punarmāsikāni kriyante tāni malamāse 'pi kāryāṇi ityāha /
GSD36mvir_sau:5481: yacca“jyeṣṭhemāsi site pakṣe“ityādivacaneṣu daśaharādau cāndramāsavācijyeṣṭhādipadaśravaṇaṃ tadagatyā lakṣaṇayā sauramāsaparam /
GSD36mvir_sau:5482: ataśca tulādistharaveḥ śuddhamāse asambhavāt malamāsa eva yugādiprāpteranutkarṣasiddhiḥ /
GSD36mvir_sau:5485: siṃhe ravau tu puṣyarkṣe pūrvāhṇe vicaredbahiḥ /
GSD36mvir_sau:5489: ata eva“śravaṇena śrāvaṇasya“ityādāvāśvalāyanasūtre śrāvaṇapadaṃ na sauramāsaparam /
GSD36mvir_sau:5504: mādhavādayastu daśaharāsu neti vacanasthaṃ vṛṣādita iti hetuvacanamanādṛtya--
GSD36mvir_sau:5506: pratimāsaṃ mṛtāhe ca śrāddhaṃ yat prativatsaram /
GSD36mvir_sau:5511: tairthikasyobhayatrakartavyatā tu yadaiva tīrthaprāptiḥ śuddhe male vā tadaiva śrāddhaṃ kuryāditivyavasthā draṣṭavyā /
GSD36mvir_sau:5512: vastutastu manvādivākyena vairūpyāpatteḥ etadvacanabalāt tīrthaśrāddhamubhayatra kāryamitiyuktam /
GSD36mvir_sau:5515: nabho vātha nabhasyo vā malamāso yadā bhavet /
GSD36mvir_sau:5517: iti nāgarakhaṇḍavacanenāṣāḍhītaḥ saptame pakṣe vihitatvāt malamāse niṣedhaḥ spaṣṭa eva /
GSD36mvir_sau:5518: yadā tvāśvinasyādhimāsatvaṃ tadāpi na kanyāsambandhabhrāntyā malināśvine mahālayaḥ kāryaḥ kintu bhādrāparapakṣa eva“anyatrava tu pañcamaḥ“ityabhidhānāt /
GSD36mvir_sau:5519: na ca kanyāyogābhāve kathaṃ tatra śrāddhamiti vācyam /
GSD36mvir_sau:5520: sakalasya pakṣasya kanyāyogābhāve kathaṃ tatra śrāddhamiti vācyam /
GSD36mvir_sau:5521: sakalasya pakṣasya kanyāsambandhābhāve 'pi bhādrapadakṛṣṇapakṣasya kanyāsaṅkrāntisparśavattvena tatra śrāddhasyānuṣṭhānaṃ śakyatvāt /
GSD36mvir_sau:5523: ante vā yadi vā madhye yatra kanyāṃ ravirvrajet /
GSD36mvir_sau:5524: sa pakṣaḥ sakalaḥ pūjyaḥ śrāddhaṃ tatra vidhīyate //
GSD36mvir_sau:5525: iti kārṣṇājinivacane 'pi sakalasya pakṣasya kanyāyogābhāve 'pi tatra śrāddhamuktam /
GSD36mvir_sau:5526: śūlapāṇyādimate tu kanyāsambandhanirapekṣasya pañcamapakṣasyaiva śrāddhakālatvādyuktameva tatra śrāddhānuṣṭhānam /
GSD36mvir_sau:5527_0: yattu tanmate kanyāgatāparapakṣe sakṛtkriyamāṇaśrāddhāntara tat kanyāgatāparapakṣasya
GSD36mvir_sau:5528: vastutastu kanyāgatāparapakṣaśrāddhaṃ na pañcamapakṣaśrāddhādbhinnaṃ śrāddhabhede vidhikalpanāgauravāpatteḥ /
GSD36mvir_sau:5529: pañcamapakṣasya“ante vā yadi vā madhya“iti vacanena kanyopalakṣitasyaiva śrāddhakālatvapratīteśca /
GSD36mvir_sau:5533: śrāvaṇabhādrayorhi malamāsatve pañcamapakṣasya kanyāsambandho na bhavet /
GSD36mvir_sau:5534: tadā ca saptamapakṣasya vihitatvāt kanyopalakṣita eva śrāddhaprāptiriti na kāpi kṣatiḥ /
GSD36mvir_sau:5536: yadā tu āśvinasya malinatvaṃ tadāpi pañcamapakṣasya kanyāsambandho 'styeva amāyāmeva kanyāpraveśāt tena ekameva śrāddhamiti yuktaṃ bahusammataṃ ca /
GSD36mvir_sau:5537: tadapi cāśvinasya malinatve 'pi kanyopalakṣitasya mukhyasyaiva pañcamapakṣasya lābhāttatraiva kāryam /
GSD36mvir_sau:5540: daivaṃ pitryaṃ tadā karma tulāsthe karturakṣayam //
GSD36mvir_sau:5541: iti jyotiḥ pitāmahavacanaṃ tulāstharavau kartavyatvabodhakaṃ tanmahālayātiriktavrīhipākādiśrāddhaparam /
GSD36mvir_sau:5542: athavā mahālayasya“yāvadvṛścikadarśanam“iti gauṇakāle 'pi vihitatvād gauṇakālabhrāntyā malināśvine kriyamāṇasya niṣedhadvārā tulāstharavau kartavyatābodhakam /
GSD36mvir_sau:5545: iti kartavyeṣu mahālayaparigaṇanaṃ kṛtaṃ tat mahālayākhyatīrthaparam /
GSD36mvir_sau:5547: atra ca jyotiḥ pitāmahavākye daivasyāpi kanyākartavyasya tulāyāṃ kartavyatvapratīterdurgāsthāpanādikamapi tatraiva kāryam /
GSD36mvir_sau:5551: śete buddhyati vṛścike sa bhagavān māsaiścaturbhirhariḥ /
GSD36mvir_sau:5553: durgā caiva tulāgame samadhike śeṣāstadanye surāḥ //
GSD36mvir_sau:5559: dvirāṣāḍhaḥ sa vijñeyo viṣṇuḥ svapiti karkaṭe //
GSD36mvir_sau:5563: ityādistu gauṇo 'tra na grāhya iti bahavaḥ /
GSD36mvir_sau:5574: bāle vā yadi vā vṛddhe śukre vāstaṃ gate ravau /
GSD36mvir_sau:5588: muṇḍanaṃ copavāsaṃ ca gautamyāṃ siṃhage ravau /
GSD36mvir_sau:5589: kanyāgate tu kṛṣṇāyāṃ na tu tattīravāsinām //
GSD36mvir_sau:5595: śaiśavaṃ prāk tu pañcāhaṃ paścāddaśadinaṃ smṛtam /
GSD36mvir_sau:5596: śaiśavaṃ vārddhakaṃ pakṣaṃ prāk paścācca bṛhaspateḥ //
GSD36mvir_sau:5603: bahavau darśitāḥ kālā ye bālye vārddhake 'pi ca /
GSD36mvir_sau:5610: vaṅgeṣu hūṇeṣu ca ṣaṭ ca pañca
GSD36mvir_sau:5615: na tyaktavyaṃ gayāśrāddhaṃ siṃhasthe ca bṛhaspatau /
GSD36mvir_sau:5622: surāsurejyāstamaye 'pi tīrthe yātrāvidhiḥ saṅkramaṇe ca śastaḥ //
GSD36mvir_sau:5628: darśaśrāddhaṃ tu yat proktaṃ pārvaṇaṃ tat prakīrttitam /
GSD36mvir_sau:5629: aparāhṇe pitṝṇāṃ ca tatra dānaṃ praśasyate //
GSD36mvir_sau:5647: iti mātsyānusārāttarpaṇamevocyate na tu piṇḍapitṛyajña iti vācyam /
GSD36mvir_sau:5648: manuvacane pitṛyajñapadena tarpaṇasya grahaṇe piṇḍānvāhāryapadasya nāmadheyatvānupapatteḥ /
GSD36mvir_sau:5654: tacca na medhātithyuktaṃ pañcamahāyajñāntargatapitṛyajñarūpaṃ tarpaṇaṃ tasya śrāddhadine prasaṅgasiddhatvana tatpaścādbhāvavidhānānupapatteḥ /
GSD36mvir_sau:5656: tatpaścāddhāvo 'pi ca yadyapi snātasya śrāddhavidhānāttarpaṇasya ca snānāṅgatvāt prāpta eva tathāpi--
GSD36mvir_sau:5658: śrāddhaṃ vā pitṛyajñaḥ syāt pitryo balirathāpi vā /
GSD36mvir_sau:5659: iti vacanoktatriprakārapitṛyajñaprāptau jalatarpaṇapunarvacanaṃ sāgnikasya śrāddhadine pitṛyajñāntaravyāvṛttyarthamiti gauḍāḥ /
GSD36mvir_sau:5660: anye tu snānaprayogāntargatasya tarpaṇasya kātīyānāmeva prāpteranyeṣāṃ snānaprayogāntarbhāve pramāṇābhāvāt prasajyeta kadācicchrāddhottaraṃ tarpaṇam /
GSD36mvir_sau:5661: ataśca tanniyamārthatve sambhavati parisaṅkhayāvidhyayogājjalatarpaṇottarabhāva eva matsyapurāṇavākye niyamyata
GSD36mvir_sau:5665: tādṛśaṃ ca tat piṇḍapitṛyajñādhikāriṇaḥ sāgnikasyaiva sambhavatīti tadbiṣayamevedaṃ jhandogapariśiṣṭavacanaṃ manuvacanaṃ ca /
GSD36mvir_sau:5666: na tu sarvaviṣayam itarān prati tatsamākhyāsambhavāt /
GSD36mvir_sau:5667: ata eva pariśiṣṭokto vāsaratṛtīyāṃśarūpo 'parāṅṇaḥ piṇḍapitṛyajñādhikāriṇa āhitāgnereva /
GSD36mvir_sau:5668: “nātisandhyāsamīpata“ityapi ca dināntyamuhūrta eva taṃ prati niṣidhyate na tu sāyāhnarūpastrimuhūrtaḥ //
GSD36mvir_sau:5672: ayaṃ ca pariśiṣṭoktaḥ kālavidhiryeṣāṃ candradarśanavati pratipaddine darśeṣṭerniṣedhasteṣāmeveti pariśiṣṭaprakāśakāraḥ /
GSD36mvir_sau:5673: tena tādṛśānuṣṭhānakarttṝn sāgnikān prati yā gakālānurodhenāmāvāsyā parisiṣṭānusāreṇa mirṇīyate /
GSD36mvir_sau:5675: candrakṣaye tu prāśastyamātraṃ“kṣīṇe rājani śasyate“iti vacanāt /
GSD36mvir_sau:5689: tadanta eva kṣayameti kṛtsna eva jyotiścakravido vadanti //
GSD36mvir_sau:5696: tṛtīyayā caturthabhāgonatvāt tribhāgamātrāvaśiṣṭayā kalayā paridṛśyo 'nayorapi amāvāsyayorādyayāme na jāyeta kintu itaramāsavadatrānayoraṇyāmāvāsyayoḥ kṣaya ityarthaḥ /
GSD36mvir_sau:5701_1: tadasparśena ekadeśavyāptyā vā bhavati tatra tadasparśacaturdaśyapekṣayāmāvāsyāyāḥ
GSD36mvir_sau:5702: tatra yā tāvat pūrvedyureva kṛtsnakālavyāpinī paredyuśca tadekadeśamapi na spṛśāti sā pūrvaiva /
GSD36mvir_sau:5703: yāpi tādṛsyevottaratra tade kadeśavyāpinī sāpi pūrvaiva /
GSD36mvir_sau:5704: paraṃ yadi yajanīyadine candradarśanādekadeśa vyāptidina eva yāgaḥ /
GSD36mvir_sau:5705: yadi tu tithivṛddhyā candrādarśanāt pratipadyeva yāgastadā ekadeśavyāptidina eva kāryam /
GSD36mvir_sau:5712: yā tu paredyureva kutsnakālavyāpinī pūrvedyustadekadeśasparśena tadasparśena vā vidyamānā sottaraiva /
GSD36mvir_sau:5714: yā tu dinadvaye 'pi vaiṣamyeṇaikadeśavyāpinī sā yaivādhikā saiva grāhyā /
GSD36mvir_sau:5715: yā tu dinadvaye sāmyenaikadeśavyāpinī sā yadi kṣayeṇa tādṛśī tadā“yadā caturdaśīyāmaṃ“iti pūrvādāhṛtakṣīyamāṇavākyāt pūrvaiva,
GSD36mvir_sau:5721: evaṃ yadā sāmyena tādṛsī tadāpi darśanādarśanakṛta eva nirṇayaḥ /
GSD36mvir_sau:5722: yadā ca keṣucitpakṣeṣu caturdaśīmiśrāmāyāmanuṣṭhānaṃ prāpnoti tadā yadi amāpratīkṣayā sarvānuṣṭhānaṃ sambhavati tadā sā pratīkṣaṇīyā no ceccatuddeśyāmapi sarvamanuṣṭheyam /
GSD36mvir_sau:5725: dinadvaye 'pyarāhṇavyāptau kṣaye pūrvā vṛddhau sāmye ca parā /
GSD36mvir_sau:5727: kṣaye pūrvā parā vṛddhau sāmya'pi ca parā smṛtā //
GSD36mvir_sau:5737: strībhiḥ śūdraiḥ kuhūḥ kāryā tathā cānagnikairdvijaḥ /
GSD36mvir_sau:5755: aṣṭakā ityetaccāśvalāyanamate śrāddhahomayoḥ kātyāyanamate ca homamātrasya nāmadheyam /
GSD36mvir_sau:5759: tathāpi sa“dravyaṃ brāhmaṇasampattiḥ“iti vadāśvalāyanoktasya kālasya lakṣaṇayā bodhakaḥ /
GSD36mvir_sau:5763: evañca varṣe pañca aṣṭakā iti siddham /
GSD36mvir_sau:5764: āśvalāyanastu bhādrāṣṭakāyā māghyāvarṣamiti saṃjñāntaraṃ paraṃ kṛtavān /
GSD36mvir_sau:5766: evañcāśvalāyanīyairbhādrakṛṣṇāṣṭamyāṃ paurāṇāṣṭakā mādhyāvarṣaṃ ca tantreṇānuṣṭheyamiti nyāyavidaḥ /
GSD36mvir_sau:5768: caturaṣṭako hemanta ityetacca triṛtuḥ saṃvatsara itye tatpakṣābhiprāyeṇa /
GSD36mvir_sau:5770: viṣṇvādismṛtau yatra tisro 'ṣṭakāstisro 'nvaṣṭakā ityetattrayāṇāmupādānaṃ tatra taddhemantagatānāmeva /
GSD36mvir_sau:5774: aindṣāṃ tu prathamāyāṃ ca śākaiḥ santarpayetpitṝn /
GSD36mvir_sau:5779: pauṣe kṛṣṇāṣṭakāyāṃ tu śākaiḥ santarpayet pitṝn /
GSD36mvir_sau:5780: itibrahmapurāṇavacanāntarāt pauṣakṛṣṇāṣṭakāyāṃ śākasantarpaṇokteḥ pauṣamāghaphālgunagatā eva tisra uktā bhavanti /
GSD36mvir_sau:5781: kūrmapurāṇe tu pauṣādigā eva tisra iti spaṣṭamuktam /
GSD36mvir_sau:5788: evaṃ ca brahmapurāṇaviṣṇudharmottarayoḥ phālgunakṛṣṇāṣṭamīvyatiriktā hemantaśiśirayostisraḥ uktā iti /
GSD36mvir_sau:5791: kṛṣṇapakṣe variṣṭhā hi pūrvā caindrī vibhāvyate //
GSD36mvir_sau:5794: śākaiḥ kāryā tṛtīyā syādeṣa dravyagato vidhiḥ /
GSD36mvir_sau:5795: yā cāpyanyā caturthī syāttāṃ ca kuryādviśeṣataḥ //
GSD36mvir_sau:5798: śākaṃ tu phālgunāṣṭamyāṃ svayaṃ patnyapi vā pacet /
GSD36mvir_sau:5799: ityanena phālgunāṣṭamyāḥ śākāṣṭakātvena pratyabhijñānānmārgaśīrṣāṣṭakāparityāgena tisra uktāḥ /
GSD36mvir_sau:5805: caturthī tu bhādrakṛṣṇāṣṭamyeva na tu phālgunakṛṣṇāṣṭamī kathamanyathā“etāstisra“iyaṃ caturthī“iti brūyāt /
GSD36mvir_sau:5806: gobhilavat prathamata eva catasra iti na vadediti /
GSD36mvir_sau:5808: aśaktau tu“ekasyāṃ vā“ityāśvalāyanasūtroktaikā purāṇoktā ca bhādrakṛṣṇāṣṭamīti dve /
GSD36mvir_sau:5810: “yā māghyāḥ paurṇamāsyā upariṣṭāt dvyaṣṭakā tasyāmaṣṭamī jyeṣṭhayā sambadhyate tāmekāṣṭaketyācakṣate“ityāpastambenai kasyā eva phālgunāṣṭamyā uktatvāt /
GSD36mvir_sau:5812: sā prakāradvayena vyākhyātā tadbhāṣyakṛtā malamāsatvena khaṇḍatithisattvena vā /
GSD36mvir_sau:5813: jyeṣṭhayā sambadhyata iti pradarśanārthaṃ na tu yadaiva jyeṣṭhāyuktā tadaivopādeyā nānyadetyevamarthamiti /
GSD36mvir_sau:5827: āsvalāyanena ca pūrvedyuḥ pitṛbhyo dadyāditi aṣṭakāśrāddhātpūrvedyuḥ śrāddhāntaramuktam /
GSD36mvir_sau:5859: nāniṣṭvā tu pitṝn śrāddhe karma vaidikamārabhet /
GSD36mvir_sau:5861: atra nāniṣṭvetivacanenaiva sarvatra nāndīśrāddhaprāptau yajñodvāhapratiṣṭhāsvityādipunarvacanaṃ niyamārtham /
GSD36mvir_sau:5863: na cotpattiviniyogābhyāṃ sāptadaśya iva sārthakatobhayorapi viniyojakatvāt /
GSD36mvir_sau:5877: śrāddhatrayaṃ tu kurvīta vaiśvadevaṃ ca tāntrikam //
GSD36mvir_sau:5881: tato mātāmahānāṃ ca vṛddhau śrāddhatrayaṃ smṛtam //
GSD36mvir_sau:5906: śastreṇa tu hatā ye vai tebhyastatra pradīyate //
GSD36mvir_sau:5915: tatrāpyasāmarthye kātyāyanaḥ, aparapakṣe kurvītorddhvraṃ vā caturthyā yadahaḥ sampadyeteti /
GSD36mvir_sau:5917: yadāpyekadine tadāmāvāsyāśrāddhātpṛthak kāryam“amāvāsyāṣṭakā vṛddhiḥ kṛṣṇapakṣe“iti pṛthaṅnirddeśāt /
GSD36mvir_sau:5922: dviścaturvā yathāśrāddhaṃ māse māse dine dine //
GSD36mvir_sau:5934: ata eva gautamenānekān kālānabhidhāyoktam--kālanithamaḥ śaktita iti /
GSD36mvir_sau:5943: tribhāgahīnaṃ pakṣaṃ vā tribhāgaṃ tvarddhameva vā //
GSD36mvir_sau:5952: evaṃ caikasminneva dine śrāddhayogyatithidvayalābhe śrāddhadvayaṃ tithivṛddhau ca śrāddhāvṛttiḥ kṛtatvāt /
GSD36mvir_sau:5955: tribhāgahīnaṃ = tṛtīyabhāgahīnaṃ pañcamīmārabhya, tribhāgaṃ = tṛtīyabhāgaṃ daśamīmārabhya
GSD36mvir_sau:5964: yeṣāṃ caturdaśyāṃ śrāddhaṃ nāsti teṣāṃ pañcamyādidaśamyā dikalpau /
GSD36mvir_sau:5972: bhānūpādhyāyastu yeṣāṃ caturdaśyāṃ śrāddhaṃ nāsti teṣāṃ dvādaśyādiḥ kalpaḥ yeṣāṃ tadasti teṣāṃ trayodaśyādirityāha /
GSD36mvir_sau:5973: vastutastu asya vākyasyānekakālopadeśamātre tātparyādgurulaghukālopadeśasyārthikatvāduttarottaralaghukālopadeśakatvābhāvāt tribhāgamityatra bhāgitayā buddhisthīkṛtasya
GSD36mvir_sau:5976: iti gautamaikavākyatayā mūlaśrutikalpanālāghavācca ardhaṃ pakṣārdhamityeva vyākhyānamucitam /
GSD36mvir_sau:5977: atra pakṣaśrāddhādikalpānāṃ gurulaghukalpatvenecchāvikalpāsambhavādekādayo tisro deyā itivatphalatāratamyamiti śrāddhavivekaḥ /
GSD36mvir_sau:5978: nitye phalābhāvānna phale tāratamyaṃ kintu śaktyapekṣayā vyavatthito vikalpaḥ /
GSD36mvir_sau:5979: ekakalpāśrayaṇe ca tadanirvāhena kalpāntarāśrayaṇe tasminprayoge tasyaiva pakṣasya kathañcinnirvāhyatvādvrīhiyavādivaditimiśrāḥ /
GSD36mvir_sau:5981: nityasyāpi kathāñcitphalavattvācchaktasya laghukalpāśrayaṇe phalābhāvakalpanāyā anyāyyatvāt ṣoḍaśigrahaṇādāvatiprasakteśca /
GSD36mvir_sau:5982: atra ca dine dina iti vīpsāśravaṇāccaturdaśyāmapi pārvaṇaṃ kāryaṃ“vajeyitvā caturdaśīm“iti niṣedhastu aparapakṣāntaracaturdaśīviṣaya iti pradīpavivekau /
GSD36mvir_sau:5989: yo vai śrāddhaṃ naraḥ kuryādekasminnapi vāsare //
GSD36mvir_sau:5992: atra kanyāsaṃsthatvavacanaṃ prāśastyārthaṃ na tu tasyaiva śrāddhakālatvam /
GSD36mvir_sau:5994: śrāddhaṃ tatra prakurvīta kanyāṃ gacchatu vā na vā //
GSD36mvir_sau:5997: madhye vā yadi vāpyante yatra kanyāṃ ravirvrajet /

GSD36mvir_sau:7175: varāhapurāṇe tu ekasyaiva brāhmaṇasya tatra tatra parāmarśādekasyāpi niyojanam /
GSD36mvir_sau:7184: āgataṃ ca dvijaṃ dṛṣṭvā kartavyā svāgatakriyā //
GSD36mvir_sau:7192: yadāpi bahubrāhmaṇapakṣastadāpi pretopabhuktavastraśayyādikamekasmā eva guṇavate deyamitarebhyo yathāśakti dakṣiṇāmātramityuktam--
GSD36mvir_sau:7199: iha ca bahuṣu vākyeṣu ekādaśāhagrahaṇaṃ na āśaucottaradinopalakṣakam /
GSD36mvir_sau:7201: sarveṣāṃmeva varṇānāṃ sūtakaṃ tu pṛthak pṛthak //
GSD36mvir_sau:7206: kṣatriyādibirapi vacanādāśauce satyapi maraṇādekādaśāha evādyaśrāddhaṃ kartavyam /
GSD36mvir_sau:7214: iti vaiṣṇavamātsyavacanataḥ kṣatrādibhirapi svasvāśaucānte ekāhatryahāśaucibhirapi tanmadhye daśāhakṛtyānuṣṭhāne tadanta evaikādaśāhaśrāddhaṃ naikādaśe 'hnīti vadanti /
GSD36mvir_sau:7219: saṅkocamātraṃ hi tadā na tu kasyacillakṣaṇā /
GSD36mvir_sau:7223: brāhmaṇa ekādaśāhe tatkurvanna pavkena bhojayet kintu tatra tyaktena yathāsaṅkhayabrāhmaṇabhojanaparyāptenāmena sūtakānte paktvā bhojayediti /
GSD36mvir_sau:7225: evaṃ ca sati ekādaśāhasūtakāntarūpakāladvayopetaṃ brāhmaṇakṣātriyādiviṣayaṃ vidhidvayamarthavadbhavati anyathā viṣṇuvacanādeva sūtakāntarūpakālopetenaikenaiva
GSD36mvir_sau:7234: evañca satyekādaśāhikānnavaśrāddhādāśaucānte vidhīyamānaṃ brāhmaṇabhojanaṃ karmāntaramiti gamyate iti hemādriḥ /
GSD36mvir_sau:7235: yadā ca“brāhmaṇe daśa piṇḍāḥ syuḥ“iti pāraskaravacanātprativarṇaṃ daśadvādaśapañcadaśatriṃśatpiṇḍāḥ,
GSD36mvir_sau:7236: yadā vā“sarvebhya“iti vākyāt dvitīyo daśaiva piṇḍā iti pakṣaḥ,
GSD36mvir_sau:7237_0: sarveṣāṃ ca khasvāśaucāntyadine daśamaḥ piṇḍastadāpi kṣatriyavaiśyaśūdrādīnāmekādaśe
GSD36mvir_sau:7243: śāve tu sūtakaṃ cetsyānniśāśeṣe tathaiva ca /
GSD36mvir_sau:7248: eka eva vṛṣotsargo gaurekā tatra dīyate //
GSD36mvir_sau:7257: navaśrāddhaṃ na kurvīta tripāde pañcake tathā //
GSD36mvir_sau:7269: tatra brahmapurāṇādau“śirastvādyena piṇḍena“ityārabhya--“daśamena tu pūrṇatvaṃ“ityantena brāhmaṇe daśamapiṇḍasya daśamadine kartavyatāmuktvā--
GSD36mvir_sau:7270: deyastu daśamaḥ piṇḍo rājñāṃ vai dvādaśe 'hani /
GSD36mvir_sau:7272: śūdrāṇāṃ daśamaḥ piṇḍo māse pūrṇe vidhīyate /
GSD36mvir_sau:7274: viṣṇunā tu āśaucadinasaṅkhayayā piṇḍasaṅkhayoktā“yāvadāśaucaṃ pretasyodakaṃ piṇḍamekaṃ ca dadyuḥ“iti /
GSD36mvir_sau:7276: brāhmaṇe daśa piṇḍāḥ syuḥ kṣatriye dvādaśa smṛtāḥ /
GSD36mvir_sau:7283: sampūrṇe tu tato māse piṇḍaśeṣaṃ samāpayet //
GSD36mvir_sau:7287: rājñāṃ dvādaśe vaiśyānāṃ pañcadaśa ityādinā daśamapiṇḍamātrotkarṣastu madhyamaḥ /
GSD36mvir_sau:7291: māsaṃ yāvadvātrapūrakapiṇḍāsamāptau kathamekādaśāhikaśrāddhavidhiḥ kathaṃ ca viṣṇūktaḥ--
GSD36mvir_sau:7297: itvāṅgirasavacanātsarveṣāṃ daśāhamevāśaucamiti pakṣaḥ sāmprataṃ cāyameva bahudhā pracārībhūtaḥ kṣatriyādyācārasaṃvādī ca /
GSD36mvir_sau:7303: prathame 'hni tṛtīye vā pañcame saptame 'pi vā /
GSD36mvir_sau:7304: dvau dvau piṇḍau pradātavyau śeṣāṃstu daśame 'hani //
GSD36mvir_sau:7308: evaṃ ca gātrapūrakapiṇḍadānaprakārāṇāmapi anayaiva rītyāvirodha iti, tanna /
GSD36mvir_sau:7313: āśaucasya ca hrāse 'pi piṇḍān dadyāddaśaiva tu /
GSD36mvir_sau:7335: tatpātheyaṃ hi bhavati mṛtasya manujasya ca //
GSD36mvir_sau:7337: atra ca śiṣṭaiḥ prathamadine kriyamāṇatvādādyadinaṃ grāhyam /
GSD36mvir_sau:7338: smṛtyarthasāre tu sañcayane kṛte manuṣyalokātpretalokaṃ gacchata āmena pātheyaśrāddhamekoddiṣṭavidhānena ityuktam /
GSD36mvir_sau:7343: prathame 'hni tṛtīye vā saptame navame 'pi vā /
GSD36mvir_sau:7346: viṣṇustu caturthamapi dinamāha--“caturthe divase 'sthisañcayanaṃ kuryātteṣāṃ gaṅgāmbhasi prakṣepa“iti /
GSD36mvir_sau:7352: sadyaḥ śauce tatkṣaṇaṃ tu kartavya iti niścayaḥ //
GSD36mvir_sau:7354: pālāśe tvasthidāhe ca sadyaḥ sañcayanaṃ bhavet /
GSD36mvir_sau:7359: na ca brahmapurāṇoktavyavasthāpakṣe saptamanavamadinapakṣayornirviṣayatā syāditi vaktavyam /
GSD36mvir_sau:7384: dviraindave tu kurvāṇaḥ punaḥ śāvaṃ samaśnute //
GSD36mvir_sau:7386: darśātprācīna ekaḥ kṣīṇa indurdarśottaramaparo bhāvī vṛddhimān /
GSD36mvir_sau:7387: kālādarśe tu etadagre tatheti kṛtvā vacanāntaraṃ likhitam /
GSD36mvir_sau:7390: evaṃ sāmānyena mātāpitṛviṣaye 'pi darśa eva piṇḍodakadānāditantrasamāpriprasaktau--
GSD36mvir_sau:7401_0: bhavatu vā pitṛviṣaye 'pi niyāmakaṃ tathāpi“asvargyaṃ lokavidviṣṭaṃ dharmyamapyācarenna
GSD36mvir_sau:7401_2: gālavavacanaṃ bādhyata iti pitryāśaucamadhye darśapāte 'pi yāvadāśaucaṃ piṇḍādikaṃ
GSD36mvir_sau:7402_0: atha vā kṣetrajasya bījipitṛviṣayaṃ dattakādiputrāṇāṃ pratigrahītrādimātāpitṛviṣayaṃ
GSD36mvir_sau:7402_1: vā gālavavacanaṃ gautamavacanaṃ tu aurasaputrikāputrayormātāpitṛviṣayam. atha vā
GSD36mvir_sau:7402_2: aurasādīnāṃ sarve ṣāmapi svamātāpitṛviṣaye āpadanāpatkalpāśrayaṇena vyavasthā vijñeyeti madanapārijātaḥ /
GSD36mvir_sau:7403: mādhavanirṇayāmatādau tryahānantaraṃ darśapāte mātāpitṛtantrasyāpi samāptirna tu tryahamadhye darśapāte gautamavacanamapi tadviṣayakameva /
GSD36mvir_sau:7404: mātāpitṛvyatiriktānāṃ tu daśāhamadhye yadā kadāciddarśapāte tantrasamāptireveti /
GSD36mvir_sau:7406: daśāhamadhye darśapāte darśātpūrvaṃ pramādālasyādinā yadā pretatantramanārabdhaṃ tadā tasya darśottaramapi ārambhaḥ samāptiścocitaiva tadā dviraindavatādoṣo 'pi parihṛto bhavati /
GSD36mvir_sau:7407: naca“ādyendāveva kartavyā“iti vacanāt darśānurodhenārambho 'pi darśātpūrvamākṣipta iti śahkanīyam /
GSD36mvir_sau:7408: ādyondāvevetyatra kartavyā iti na vidhīyate tathāsati“ādyandau“iti“kartavyā“iti ca vidheyadvaye vākyabhedaḥ syāt /
GSD36mvir_sau:7409: tenātrāpi dviraindava iti niṣedhāt dviraindavatvameva niṣidhyata iti /
GSD36mvir_sau:7410: kvaciddarśapātavat saṅkrāntivyatīpātayorapi pāte tantrasamāptiḥ vacanaṃ ca saṅgraha itikṛtvā likhitam /
GSD36mvir_sau:7416: atha navamiśrāṇi ṣoḍaśaśrāddhāni cetyevaṃprasiddhānāṃ māsikānāṃ kālaḥ /
GSD36mvir_sau:7419: tāni ca maraṇamāsādārabhya saṃvatsaraṃ yāvatpratimāsaṃ vidhīyamānāni dvādaśa ūnamāsikaṃ traipākṣikam ūnaṣāṇmāsikamūnābdikaṃ cetyeva ṣoḍaśa bhavanti /
GSD36mvir_sau:7431: ūnaṣāṇmāsikamūne ṣaṣṭhe māsi, traipakṣikaṃ tṛtīye pakṣe, unābdikamūne dvādaśe māsi, ūnamāsikaṃ tu
GSD36mvir_sau:7449: ekāhena tu ṣaṇmāsā yadā syurapi vā tribhiḥ /
GSD36mvir_sau:7453: ekenāhnā nyūne ekadinapūrttinyūne tadantime dine ityarthaḥ /
GSD36mvir_sau:7457: māsikāni svakīye tu divase dvādaśe 'pi vā //
GSD36mvir_sau:7463: ūnā nyūneṣu māseṣu viṣamāhe same 'pi vā /
GSD36mvir_sau:7467: ṣaṣṭhe ṣāṇmāsikaṃ kuryāt dvādaśe māsi cābdikam /
GSD36mvir_sau:7474: kintu tripakṣa ityadhikaraṇasaptamyanurodhādvṛtte pravṛtte ityartha iti kaścit /
GSD36mvir_sau:7477: dvādaśe 'hani māse ca tripakṣe ca tataḥ param //
GSD36mvir_sau:7478: iti brahmapurāṇavākye 'pi pūrvodāhṛtavacanopātta-vṛtta iti padasya atīta iti yathāśrutamevārthaṃ kṛtvā atrāpi tripakṣe ityasyāgre 'tīta iti śeṣaṃ pūrayanti /
GSD36mvir_sau:7485: māsikaṃ pratimāsaṃ mṛtāhe kriyamāṇaṃ dvādaśasaṅkyākam, ābdikamūnābdikam /
GSD36mvir_sau:7487: atra ca dvitīyādimāsikāni dvitīyatṛtīyādi māseṣu mṛtāhe kartavyāni ādyamāsikaṃ tu ekādaśe 'hni kartavyamityāha--
GSD36mvir_sau:7489: mṛte 'hani tu kartavyaṃ pratimāsaṃ tu vatsaram /
GSD36mvir_sau:7493: ādyamṛtatithiṃ gṛhītvottaramutatitheḥ pūrvatithiparyantaṃ triṃśattithisamudāyātmakacāndramāsamānena caitraśuklapañcamyāṃ mṛtasyāgrimaśuklacaturthyāṃ māsikam,
GSD36mvir_sau:7494: evamūnaṣāṇmāsikonābdakayorekāhanyūnatāpakṣe tryahanyūtāpakṣe ca tṛtīyāyāṃ pratipadi ca tayoranuṣṭhānamiti /
GSD36mvir_sau:7504: mādhavena tūnaṣāṇmāsikaṃ saptamāsagatamṛtāhadinātpūrvedyuranuṣṭheyam ūnābdikaṃ ca dvitīyavatsarādermṛtāhadinātpūrvedyuḥ kartavyamiti /
GSD36mvir_sau:7509_0: māsādau bhavaṃ māsikamiti vyutpattyā vā māsikasya yadyapi tanmāsabhavanaṃ tanmāsasambandho
GSD36mvir_sau:7510: tathāpi prathamātikrame kāraṇā bhāvāt vakṣyamāṇasmārttabahuvacanānurodhācca māsopakrama eva kartavyatā niścīyate /
GSD36mvir_sau:7512: māsikāni svakīye tu divasa“iti“mṛtāheṣvitarāṇi tu“iti“mṛte 'hani tu kartavyaṃ“iti ca /
GSD36mvir_sau:7514: dvādaśe 'hani māse ca tripakṣe ca tataḥ param /
GSD36mvir_sau:7515: māsi māsi tu kartavyaṃ yāvatsamvatsaraṃ dvijaiḥ //
GSD36mvir_sau:7521: ekādaśe caturthe ca māsi māsi ca vatsaram /
GSD36mvir_sau:7524: evaṃ satyādyamāsikamekādaśāhe, ūnamāsikamūne māsi dvādaśāhe vā, dvitīyamāsikaṃ
GSD36mvir_sau:7526: tṛtīyamāsikaṃ tṛtīyamāsasyādyamṛtatithau kriyamāṇatvāccaitraśuklapañcamīpramītasya vaiśākha śuklapañcamyāṃ kriyamāṇaṃ dvitīyamāsikaṃ jyeṣṭhaśuklapañcamyāṃ tṛtīyamāsikaṃ bhavati /
GSD36mvir_sau:7527: evamagre 'pi tattanmāse budhvā dvādaśamāsasya phālgunasyādyamṛtatithau pañcamyāṃ dvādaśamāsikaṃ kṛtvā ūnābdikaṃ caitraśuklacaturthyāṃ bhavati /
GSD36mvir_sau:7528: yadā tu sapiṇḍīkaraṇe“tataḥ saṃvatsare pūrṇe sapiṇḍīkaraṇam“itikātyāyanapakṣastadā tasminneva dine ūnābdikasapiṇḍīkaraṇayorbaddhakramatvādūnābdikaṃ kṛtvā sapiṇḍīkṛtiḥ /
GSD36mvir_sau:7530: tadā pūrvadine caturthyāmūnābdikaṃ kṛtvā caitraśuklapañcamyāṃ dvitīyavatsarādyamṛtatithau sapiṇḍīkaraṇaṃ kṛtvā tatraivābdikāmitiboddhavyam /
GSD36mvir_sau:7532: kātyāyanavākye 'pi saṃvatsare pūrṇe sati dbitīyadine sapiṇḍīkaraṇamiti vyākhyāsambhavāt /
GSD36mvir_sau:7535: nyūnābde yattadardhe yadapi tadapare dvādaśāhe tripakṣe /
GSD36mvir_sau:7537: tatrādyamāsikaṃ mṛtāhe prāptam--“ādyamekādaśe 'hani“itivacanādekā daśe 'hni utkṛṣya vidhīyate /
GSD36mvir_sau:7539: tataścaikādaśī'hni śrāddhatrayaṃ navaśrāddhāntyam ādyamāsikaṃ svatantraikoddiṣṭaṃ ceti /
GSD36mvir_sau:7540: smṛtyarthasāre 'pyuktaṃ svatantraikoddiṣṭe kriyamāṇe anyeṣāṃ tantreṇānuṣṭhānasiddhiricchatāmasti pṛthaganuṣṭhānapakṣe cādau svatantraikoddiṣṭaṃ kāryamiti /
GSD36mvir_sau:7542: anyathonānāṃ tattanmāsikottaratvaṃ traipakṣikasya ca dvitīyottaratvaṃ na syāt /
GSD36mvir_sau:7544: na caivaṃ sarvādyamṛtatithau māsikāpattirmṛtatithermṛtatithiṃ yāvaccāndrasya vivakṣitatvāt /
GSD36mvir_sau:7545: mṛtatitheriti vāvadhau paccamī tenānyamṛtatithereva pūrvamāsaśabdārthatvam ataśca prathamamāsikaṃ dvitīyamṛtatithāveveti /
GSD36mvir_sau:7549: nanu“pratisaṃvattsaraṃ caivaṃ“itivacanādādyamṛtatithiṃ gṛhītvā ādyasāṃvatsāṃrekasyāpi ādmāsikavatpravṛttiḥ syāditicet, satyam /
GSD36mvir_sau:7551: pratyuta tasya dbitīyavatsarādyamṛtatithāvutpannatvādādyamatatithau prāptireva nāstīti dvitīyavatsarādau kriyamāṇamābdikamityucyate tṛtīyavatsarādau tu pratyābdikamiti /
GSD36mvir_sau:7553: smṛtyarthasāre, dbitīyasaṃvatsarādāvābdikaṃ tṛtīyasaṃvatsarādau pratyābdi kamiti krama iti /
GSD36mvir_sau:7568: iti ṛṣyaśṛṅgavacane trayodaśamāsikasya niṣedhaśravaṇādadhikamāse 'pi māsikavikalpa iti kecit /
GSD36mvir_sau:7570: yattu hemādṣādau ṣoḍaśaśrāddhānāṃ prakārāntareṇa gaṇanaṃ sapiṇḍīkaraṇādīnāṃ ca ṣoḍaśaśrāddhāntargatatvenopavarṇanam /
GSD36mvir_sau:7573: nṝṇāṃ tu tyaktadehānāṃ śrāddhāḥ ṣoḍaśa sarvadā /
GSD36mvir_sau:7582: riktayośca tithyorityekenānhā nyūne ṣaṣṭhe dvādaśe ca māse ityarthaḥ /
GSD36mvir_sau:7599: viruddhagaṇanasya tu śākhābhadena deśabhedena vā vyavasthā draṣṭavyeti /
GSD36mvir_sau:7600: kṣatriyādibhirapyetadādyaṃ śrāddhaṃ satyapyāśauca ekā daśe 'hanyeva kāryam /
GSD36mvir_sau:7616: āhitāgnermaraṇadinā danyasmin dine dāhe sati dāhadinādārabhya navaśrāddhaikādaśāhikatraipakṣikāntāni kuryāt /
GSD36mvir_sau:7634: mukhyaṃ śrāddhaṃ māsi māsi aparyāptāvṛtuṃ prati /
GSD36mvir_sau:7637: pratimāsaṃ mṛtāhe māsikaṃ śrāddhamiti mukhyaḥ kalpaḥ /
GSD36mvir_sau:7639: ṛtoratra cāndrasya saurasya vāsambhavānmāsadvayaśrāddhamagrimamāsi kāryamiti tasyārthaḥ /
GSD36mvir_sau:7641: pūrvamāse mṛtitithimullaṅdhyottaramāse mṛtitithau atikrāntaśrāddhaṃ prāptakālaṃ ca śrāddhaṃ ceti dvayaṃ tatra kāryam /
GSD36mvir_sau:7643: yathā ekādaśāhe ādyaṃ nirvarttya ūnamāsikaṃ ca svakāle kṛtvā
GSD36mvir_sau:7644: tato dvitīyamāsikaṃ traipakṣikaṃ ca tṛtīyamāsikena saha,
GSD36mvir_sau:7652: atha vā dvādaśāhena dvādaśabhirdinaiḥ apavarge tṛtīyā /
GSD36mvir_sau:7661: dvādaśabhirdinaiḥ ṣoḍaśa śrāddhāni kṛtvā taduttaradine sapiṇḍīkaraṇam /
GSD36mvir_sau:7662: śrāddhacintāgaṇau tu dvādaśāhamupakramya dvādaśabhirddinairdvādaśa māsikāni śrāddhāni kṛtvā tataḥ pareha'ni sapiṇḍīkaraṇamityuktam iti tṛtīyakalpaḥ /
GSD36mvir_sau:7664: atha vā ekasminneva dine ekāhe ekādaśāhe dva /
GSD36mvir_sau:7665: daśāhe vā dvādaśāpi māsikāni kṛtvā sapiṇḍīkaraṇaṃ kāryamiti caturthaḥ kalpaḥ /
GSD36mvir_sau:7672: ekoddiṣṭe tu samprāpte yadi vivnaḥ grajāyate /
GSD36mvir_sau:7673: māse 'nyasmina tithau tasyāṃ kuryādantaritaṃ ca yat //
GSD36mvir_sau:7674: antaritaṃ māsikaṃ taduttarasambandhini māsi kuryāditi kālādarśe /
GSD36mvir_sau:7677: āśaucādinā tu māsikāntarāye āśaucānte uttaramāse mṛtatithau vā amāvāsyāyāṃ vā kṛṣṇaikādaśryāṃ vā anukalpena śuklaikādaśyāmapi veti /
GSD36mvir_sau:7682: etāni ṣoḍaśa śrāddhāni saṃvatsarādarvāk dvādaśāhādau sipaṇḍīkaraṇe kartavye apakṛṣya sapiṇḍīkaraṇātpūrvaṃ karttaṃvyāni /
GSD36mvir_sau:7687: sapiṇḍīkaraṇāt prāgapakṛṣya kṛtānyapi sapiṇḍanottaraṃ punastāni svasvakāle kartavyāni /
GSD36mvir_sau:7691: māsikaṃ codakummaṃ ca deyaṃ tasyāpi vatsaram //
GSD36mvir_sau:7702: ṣoḍaśānāṃ madhye yāni svasvakāle dvitrāṇi kṛtāni tataḥ sapiṇḍana upasthite tatpūrvaṃ yāni avaśiṣṭāni apakṛṣya kṛtāni tānyeva punaḥ kuryāt na tvanyāni svasvakāle kṛtānītyarthaḥ /
GSD36mvir_sau:7704: vivāhādyupasthitau tu sapiṇḍīkaraṇātpūrvamapakṛṣya kṛtānyapi vūdhdyanantaraṃ punarnaiva kāryāṇītyāha--
GSD36mvir_sau:7706: nirvartya vṛddhitantraṃ tu māsikāni na tantrayet /
GSD36mvir_sau:7709: vṛdhdyatantaraṃ māsikāni na kuryāttadā ayātayāmaṃ nūtanaṃ maraṇaṃ na bhavet /
GSD36mvir_sau:7721: yathākālaṃ tu kāryāṇi nānyathā mucyate tataḥ //
GSD36mvir_sau:7724: arvāksapiṇḍīkaraṇe tu kena niroddhavyo 'pakarṣa iti ṣoḍaśaśrāddhāni kṛtvaiva sapiṇḍīkaraṇaṃ saṃvatsarātprāgapi kartavyamiti /
GSD36mvir_sau:7726: yadā prāksapiṇḍīkaraṇāt pretaśrāddhāni karoti tadaikoddiṣṭavidhānena kuryāt /
GSD36mvir_sau:7727: yadā tu tadūrdhvaṃ karoti tadābdikaṃ śrāddhaṃ yo yathā karoti pārvaṇamekoddiṣṭaṃ vā tathā māsikāni kuryāt /
GSD36mvir_sau:7731: pratyabdaṃ yo yathā kuryāttathā kuryātsa tānyapi //
GSD36mvir_sau:7733: tathā saṃvatsaraparyantaṃ pratidinaṃ pretodde śena bhojanaparyāptānnasahita udakumbho deyaḥ /
GSD36mvir_sau:7743: pāraskareṇa piṇḍadānamapyatra pākṣikamuktam--aharaharannamasmai brāhmaṇāyodakumbhaṃ ca dadyātpiṇḍamapyeke nipṛṇantīti /
GSD36mvir_sau:7753: annaṃ caiva svaśattyā tu saṅkhayāṃ kṛtvābdikasya tu /
GSD36mvir_sau:7754: dātavyaṃ brāhmaṇebhyastu yadvā tanniṣkrayaṃ ca yat //
GSD36mvir_sau:7759_1: ekasminnapi dine tāvanto yathāsambhavaṃ yadā kadācidvā vatsaramadhye tāvanto deyā
GSD36mvir_sau:7761: tathāpi guṇapradhānabhāvāvivakṣayā idamannameṣa kumbha iti pṛthageva tyāgaḥ kāryaḥ /
GSD36mvir_sau:7762: atra ca yadā pretoddeśenānnasya tatsthānīyasya vā dravyasya śraddhayā tyāgaḥ śrāddhamiti vijñāneśvaroktaṃ śrāddhalakṣaṇaṃ,
GSD36mvir_sau:7764: pitrādīṃścaturthyantapadairuddiśya havistyāgaḥ śrāddhamiti śūlapāṣyuktaṃ ca śrāddha lakṣaṇaṃ,
GSD36mvir_sau:7769: ahanyahani yaccoditaṃ tannityāmatyabhidhānādyatrāvadhidinaviśeṣānupādānena jīvanāvadhi niyojyatvaṃ pratīyate tannityam /
GSD36mvir_sau:7784: tripuṣkaraṃ ca tripānnakṣatraṃ bhadrā tithirgurubhaumaravivārāṇāmanyatamasya melane bhavati /
GSD36mvir_sau:7794: dvitīyāsaptamīdvādaśīnāṃ bhadrātithīnāṃ punarvasūttarāphālgunīviśākhottarāṣāḍhāpūrvābhādrapadanakṣatrāṇāṃ bhānubhaumaśanaiścarāṇāṃ ca melane tripuṣkaraṃ dbimelane dvipuṣkaram /
GSD36mvir_sau:7810: tatra śrāddhaṃ na kurvīta gṛhī putradhanakṣayāt //
GSD36mvir_sau:7817: nakṣatre tu na kurvīta yasmin jāto bhavennaraḥ /
GSD36mvir_sau:7818: na prauṣṭhapadayoḥ kārṃyaṃ tathāgneye ca bhārata! //
GSD36mvir_sau:7819: dāruṇeṣu ca sarveṣu pratyarau ca vivarjayet /
GSD36mvir_sau:7820: jyautiṣe yāni coktāni tāni yatnena varjayet //
GSD36mvir_sau:7866: atra hi karturuddeśyasya niragnitve nimitte kālo niyamyate tasyaiva karmāṅgatvena vidhīyamānatvāt /
GSD36mvir_sau:7867: yattu kāle karma vidhīyate na karmaṇi kāla itinyāyavidvacanaṃ tadanupādeyatvābhiprāyam /
GSD36mvir_sau:7871: atra hi pūrṇa iti varṣasamāptyuttaradina ityarthaḥ /
GSD36mvir_sau:7879: tatrāpi sati saptamyeva na tu daśānte paṭa itivadvācakatvaṃ pūrvodāhṛtavākyavirodhāt /
GSD36mvir_sau:7880: yacca smṛtyarthasāre dvādaśamāsopāntyadine ūnābdikaṃ taduttaradine sapiṇḍīkaraṇaṃ taduttaradine mṛtāharūpe prathamābdikamiti,
GSD36mvir_sau:7882_0: evañca sati ekoddiṣṭapradhānakatvena madhyāhne sapiṇḍanaṃ vidhāya pārvaṇapradhānakatvena
GSD36mvir_sau:7882_1: vāparāhṇe sapiṇḍanaṃ kṛtvā sambhave 'parāhṇa eva gauṇakālarūpasāyāhne vā sāṃvatsarikaṃ
GSD36mvir_sau:7884: kecittu mṛtāhadine sapiṇḍane ābdikalopa eva mukhyakālasyābhāvāt,
GSD36mvir_sau:7887: nahi gauṇakāle 'nuṣṭhānaṃ niṣiddhamapi tu mukhyakāle 'nadhikṛtasya gauṇakāle /
GSD36mvir_sau:7889: yacca śeṣabhojanaṃ vinā karmāsamāpterna karmāntarārambha iti /
GSD36mvir_sau:7892: taduttaraṃ ca rāgataḥ prāpte bhojane pratipattimākāṅkṣamāṇasya śeṣasya niyamo na tu śeṣabhojanaṃ śrāddhāṅgam /
GSD36mvir_sau:7894_1: vihitena vyavahitaṃ sadābdikaśrāddhāṅgakaśeṣabhojanena saha tantreṇaikasmin dine
GSD36mvir_sau:7896: bhrātā vā bhrātṛputro vā sapiṇḍaḥ śiṣya eva vā /
GSD36mvir_sau:7899: gomilo 'pi yadaharvā vṛddhirāpadyate iti vṛddhirvā yadahaḥ syāditi /
GSD36mvir_sau:7903: sapiṇḍīkaraṇasya madhyāhnakālatvāt vṛddhiśrāddhasya ca prātaḥ kālikatvāt /
GSD36mvir_sau:7914: ayaṃ cāpakarṣaḥ sapiṇḍanaṃ vinā pitrādīnāṃ pārvaṇārhapitṛtvaprāptyabhāvena nāndīśrāddhasya kartumaśakyatvāt
GSD36mvir_sau:7915: jñeyo na tu vācanika iti kecit /
GSD36mvir_sau:7916: apare tu na hyadṛṣṭārthe hetunā prayojanam /
GSD36mvir_sau:7917: na hyapakarṣe devatāsambhavaḥ prayojakaḥ kintu vidhiḥ /
GSD36mvir_sau:7918: devatāyā abhāve tu jīvatpitṛkasyeva karmalopa eva yuktaḥ /
GSD36mvir_sau:7922: kiñcāhitāgnairdaihitrasya vidyamāne 'pi niragnau mātule pārvaṇānuroghena mātāmahasapiṇḍīkaraṇaṃ prāpnuyāddauhitrānurodhena vā mātulasya gauṇakāle 'nuṣṭhānaprasaṅgaḥ,
GSD36mvir_sau:7934: atra ca “tripakṣe vai sapiṇḍanam'; ityatra tṛtīyasya pakṣasyādhikaraṇa toktā saptamīśravaṇāt /
GSD36mvir_sau:7935: na cāstu saptamī paraṃ tu satisaptamī sā,
GSD36mvir_sau:7936: evaṃ ca māsikābdikādiśrāddhavanmṛtatithisajātīyāyāṃ tithau sapiṇḍīkaraṇa miti vācyam /
GSD36mvir_sau:7937: “upapadavibhakteḥ kārakavibhaktirbalīyasī“itinyāyātsa tisaptamīto 'dhikaraṇasaptamyā eva balīyastvātpūraṇārthakapratyayabalā hvitīyapakṣasyaiva lābhāt /
GSD36mvir_sau:7938_0: na ca“pūrṇe saṃvatsare ṣaṇmāse tripakṣe yadaharvā vṛddhirāpadyate“iti gobhilavākye
GSD36mvir_sau:7941: hemādristu pakṣatraye pūrṇa iti vadannapi tṛtīyapakṣasampūrttidinasyaivādhikaraṇatvamāha saptamīsvārasyāt na tu taduttaradinasyeti /
GSD36mvir_sau:7950: atrārvākdarśādityuktāvapi“ekādaśāhe dvādaśāhe vā“ityādi baudhāyanādyuktavihitakāla eva kartavyaṃ,
GSD36mvir_sau:7960: ddhāviṃśatidinādūrdhvaṃ bhavati tadāśaucātparato dvādaśasu divaseṣu ṣoḍaśaśrāddhāni kṛtvā trayodaśadivase sapiṇḍīkaraṇaṃ kāryam /
GSD36mvir_sau:7962: māsikārthavat dvādaśāhaṃ śrāddhaṃ kṛtvā trayodaśe 'hni vā kuryāt /
GSD36mvir_sau:7967: tatronamāsikatraipakṣikonaṣāṇmāsikāni prathamadvitīyaṣaṣṭhadvādaśādivaseṣu kāryāṇi divasasya māsa tthānīyatvāt /
GSD36mvir_sau:7968_0: ata evāgre“saṃvatsarābhyantare yadyadhikamāsako bhavettadā māsikārthaṃ dinamekaṃ
GSD36mvir_sau:7968_1: vardhayet“iti tenaivoktam dvādaśāhaṃ trayodaśa iti cāśaucottaradinamārabhyaiva“parato
GSD36mvir_sau:7970: tatā sāgninā pravasitena vicchinnāgninā vā pārvaṇaśrāddhānurodhenāpi apakarṣaḥ kāryaḥ /
GSD36mvir_sau:7974: na pārvaṇaṃ nābhyudayaṃ kurvanna labhate phalam //
GSD36mvir_sau:7977: etacca yanmate piṇḍapitṛyajñanimittaṃ sapiṇḍīkaraṇāpakarṣaṇaṃ tanmate 'pi pituriva māturapi kāryam /
GSD36mvir_sau:7978: ekatvaṃ sā gatā bharttuḥ piṇḍe gotre ca sūtake /
GSD36mvir_sau:7986: anyathā mātāmahena saha sapiṇḍane mātāmahapiṇḍabhoktṛtvaṃ na syāt /
GSD36mvir_sau:7989: tasmātsāgninā kartrā āśaucottaraṃ dvādaśasu divaseṣu māsikāni kṛtvā trayodaśe 'hni maraṇadinādārabya vā dvādaśe dine ekādaśe 'hani eva vā darśapāte tatraiva sapiṇḍanaṃ kāryam /
GSD36mvir_sau:7990: atra ca pramādādakaraṇe tripakṣādiṣu vihiteṣu kāleṣu kāryam /
GSD36mvir_sau:7996: tasyaiva dvādaśāhādīnāṃ mukhyatvāt tadagrimāṇāmanukalpatvena vidhānamuktaṃ na tu niragnikasya /
GSD36mvir_sau:7997: tasya varṣāntasyaiva mukhyatvāt, na ca taduttaraṃ vihitaḥ kālo 'stīti /
GSD36mvir_sau:7999: dvādaśe 'hani ṣaṣṭhe vā tripakṣe vā trimāsi vā /
GSD36mvir_sau:8003: baudhāyanaḥ--atha saṃvatsare pūrṇe sapiṇḍīkaraṇaṃ tripakṣe tṛtīyamāsi ṣaṣṭhe vaikādaśe vā dvādaśāhe veti /
GSD36mvir_sau:8004: atrāpi pūrvoktayuttyādhikaraṇatve siddhe yadatīte ṣaṣṭhe māsīti kasyacidvyākhyānaṃ tatra mūlaṃ mṛgyam /
GSD36mvir_sau:8008: māsikārthavat dvādaśāhaṃ śrāddhaṃ kṛtvā trayodaśe 'hni vā kuryāta /
GSD36mvir_sau:8013: asthitiśca rājopadravādinā deśatyāgasambhāvanārūpā rogādinā karmāsāmarthyarūpā vā /
GSD36mvir_sau:8014: prāśastyaṃ ca mukhyakālānuṣṭhiteneva tasmin kāle 'nuṣṭhitenāpyanena pretatva nivṛttirbhavatīti /
GSD36mvir_sau:8015: dvādaśāhaśca dvādaśañca tadahaścetivyutpattyā dvādaśaṃ dinaṃ tacca mṛtadināvadhikameva /
GSD36mvir_sau:8016: dvādaśānāmahnāṃ saṅghāto dvādaśāhaḥ ṣoḍaśaśrāddhāpakarṣakaḥ kālaḥ sa cābhyudayarūpa iti śūlapāṇiḥ /
GSD36mvir_sau:8017: nanu kathamasya praśastatvaṃ sapiṇḍīkaraṇaṃ hi pitṛtvaprāptyarthaṃ na ca dvādaśāhe kṛtaṃ kevalaṃ tatpitṛtvāpādakaṃ bhavati /
GSD36mvir_sau:8028: ataḥ pūrvaṃ kṛte 'pi sapiṇḍane vatsarānta eva pretatvanivṛtteḥ kathamasya praśastatbamiticet,
GSD36mvir_sau:8029: ṣoḍaśaśrāddhānyakṛtvā kṛte sapiṇḍane na pitṛtvaprāptirityetatparamidaṃ vacanadvayam /
GSD36mvir_sau:8034: nanu ṣoḍaśaśrāddhānyapakṛṣya kṛte sapiṇḍana pretatvanivṛtterjātatvātpunarmāsikodakumbhaśrāddhaṃ na syāt /
GSD36mvir_sau:8038: māsikaṃ codakumbhaṃ ca deyaṃ tasyāpi vatsaram //
GSD36mvir_sau:8041: kecittu vṛddhinimittaṃ vināpakṛṣṭe sapiṇḍane saṃvatsarānta eva pretatvanivṛttiḥ /
GSD36mvir_sau:8047: pretatvācceha nistīrṇāḥ prāptā pitṛgaṇaṃ tu te //
GSD36mvir_sau:8049: yadi vāśavatyā gauṇekāle 'nuṣṭhāna daivāttaduttaraṃ vṛddhyādyāpadyeta tadā vṛddhikālaṃ prāpya pretatvaparihāro bhavati tasya vatsarāntakālatulyatvāditi vadanti /
GSD36mvir_sau:8052: yadi cāhitāgnerdvādaśāhasyeva mukhyatvena pretatvanivṛttiphalakasya sapiṇḍanasyātra vihitatvāditi,
GSD36mvir_sau:8054: mukhyakālaśca na svarūpeṇa prayojakaḥ anyathā vatsarānte sapiṇḍanābhāve 'pi pretatvanivṛttiḥ syādeva tasmānmakhyakāle 'nuṣṭhitameva sapiṇḍanaṃ pretatvanivartakaṃ vācyam /
GSD36mvir_sau:8055: evaṃ sati vihitasyānarthakatvānupapattyā vihitakāle 'nuṣṭhitameva pretatvanivartakamityastu kṛtaṃ mukhyatvenota /
GSD36mvir_sau:8058: kecittu sarveṣāmapi kālānāhitāgniṃ prati mukhyatvena dvādaśādikāleṣu kṛtaṃ sapiṇḍanaṃ vṛddhipūrvaṃ kṛtamiva pretatvanivartakamiti /
GSD36mvir_sau:8064: kecittu idaṃ sakalasādhāraṇamukhyakālasaṅgrāhakaṃ na tu niragnerekādaśāhādipratipādakam /
GSD36mvir_sau:8066: evaṃ ca“yā tupūrvamamāvāsyā“ityādivākyaistāṃstān prati prāprāneva kālān vidadhannāpūrvaśrutimūlamityāhuḥ /
GSD36mvir_sau:8070: dvādaśe 'hani ṣaṣṭhe vā tripakṣe vā trimāsi vā /
GSD36mvir_sau:8077: anye tu vatsarānto mukhyastatsannihita ekādaśo māso jaghanyaḥ /
GSD36mvir_sau:8079: yadā ca sapiṇḍīkaraṇārthaṃ ṣoḍaśaśrāddhānyapakṛṣyante tadā mṛtatithisajātīyāyāṃ tithau kāryāṇi /
GSD36mvir_sau:8081: asambhave tu sapiṇḍanadine eva nimitte sannidhānāt /
GSD36mvir_sau:8082: atha vā sati kālavyavadhāne prāgudāhṛtaviṣṇuvākyāt dvādaśasu divaseṣu
GSD36mvir_sau:8089: iti vidhānānmāsaṃ śūdrasyāśaucasattvādavayavapiṇḍasya daśamasya taṃ prati sūtakānte vihitatvāt kathaṃ dvādaśāhe śūdrasya sapiṇḍanamitivācyam /
GSD36mvir_sau:8091: ityetatpakṣamāśritya vā sacchūdrasya darśaśrāddhānurodhena ekādaśāhavidhivadvacanabalātsūtakanivṛttimabhyupetya vā vacanāt sūtakamadhya eva vā kāryamiti na doṣaḥ /
GSD36mvir_sau:8093_0: vastuto dvādaśāhapadaṃ na maraṇadinādārabhya dvādaśāhaparaṃ kintu sūtakāntadivasādūrdhvaṃ
GSD36mvir_sau:8093_1: dvijātivat dvādaśasu divaseṣu dvādaśa māsikāni kṛtvā dvādaśāha eva sapiṇḍanaṃ kāryaṃ
GSD36mvir_sau:8094: ata eva tatroktam--yadyadhimāsastadā trayodaśe dina iti /
GSD36mvir_sau:8098: deśāntaragatānāṃ ca putrāṇāṃ ca kathaṃ bhavet /
GSD36mvir_sau:8099: śrutvā tu vapanaṃ kāryaṃ daśāhaṃ tu tilodakam //
GSD36mvir_sau:8104: raudrahaste ca rohiṇyāṃ maitrabhe vā samācaret //
GSD36mvir_sau:8108: śrāddhaṃ ca trividhaṃ pārvaṇamekoddiṣṭaṃ daivikaṃ ca /
GSD36mvir_sau:8111: trīnuddiśya tu yattaddhi pārvaṇaṃ munayo viduḥ //
GSD36mvir_sau:8115: tatra yasyāṃ tithau pārvaṇaśrāddhaṃ vihitaṃ sā yadi dinadvayasambandhinībhavettadā yasminpūrvasminparasminvā dine 'parāhṇavyāpinī tasmin dine pārvaṇamanuṣṭheyam /
GSD36mvir_sau:8117: tayā karmāṇi kurvīta hrāsavṛddhī na kāraṇam //
GSD36mvir_sau:8126: sā pitṛbhyo yato dattā hyaparāhṇaḥ svayaṃbhuvā //
GSD36mvir_sau:8127: yasyāmaparāhṇasambandhinyāṃ ravirastaṃ yāti sā pitṛkārye praśaste tyarthaḥ /
GSD36mvir_sau:8130: sā grāhyā pitṛkārye tu na pūrvāstānuyāyinī //
GSD36mvir_sau:8132: tathā ca yāparāhṇavyāpinyastānuyāyinī sā pitṛkārye grāhyetyarthaḥ /
GSD36mvir_sau:8133: yadā tu dinadvaye 'pi nāparāhṇavyā pinī tadāpi pūrvaiva grāhyā /
GSD36mvir_sau:8140: mūlaṃ hi pitṛtṛptyarthaṃ paitraṃ coktaṃ maharṣibhiḥ //
GSD36mvir_sau:8142: titheḥ prāntaṃ surākhyaṃ hi upoṣyaṃ kavayo viduḥ /
GSD36mvir_sau:8143: pitryaṃ mūlaṃ titheḥ proktaṃ śāstrajñaiḥ kālakovidaiḥ //
GSD36mvir_sau:8145: na tatraudayikī grāhyā daive hyaudayikī tithiḥ //
GSD36mvir_sau:8147: sāyāhnavyāpinī yā tu pārvaṇe sā uhāhṛtā /
GSD36mvir_sau:8150: udite daivataṃ bhānau pitryaṃ cāstamite ravau /
GSD36mvir_sau:8152: bhānāvudite sati yad dvimuhūrtaṃ muhūrtadvayaṃ taddaivataṃ = daivakarmayogyam /
GSD36mvir_sau:8153: astamite astaṃ gantumārabdhe bhānau astamayātpūrvaṃ yat trimuhūrtaṃ tatpitryaṃ = pitryakarmayogyam /
GSD36mvir_sau:8155: dinadvaye 'pi vaiṣamyeṇāparāhṇaikadeśavyāptau tadādhikyavatī grāhyā “aṇurapi viśeṣo 'dhyavasāyakara'; iti nyāyāt /
GSD36mvir_sau:8157: dinadvaye 'pi sāmyenāparāhṇaikadeśavyāptiśca śrāddhāṅgatithervṛdhdyā kṣayeṇa sāmyena vā bhavati,
GSD36mvir_sau:8165: atra sarvatvādīnāṃ grāhyatithigatatvaṃ kharvadarpayoḥ parayorhisāyāśca pūrvasyā grāhyatvābhidhānāt /
GSD36mvir_sau:8166_1: yadā viṃśatighaṭīparimitā pūrvatithir bhavati dvāviṃśatighaṭīparimitā cottaratithistadā
GSD36mvir_sau:8170: yadā ca pūrvottaradinayoḥ pūrvottare tithī ekaviṃśatighaṭīparamite stastadāpi sāmyenaiva ghaṭītrayaparimitāparāhṇaikadeśavyāptirbhavati tithiśca sāmyamupaiti /
GSD36mvir_sau:8171: atra vṛddhisāmyayoḥ parā grāhyā kṣaye pūrveti /
GSD36mvir_sau:8174: āmaśrāddhaṃ tu pūrvāhṇa ekoddiṣṭaṃ tu madhyataḥ /
GSD36mvir_sau:8181: vidhijño vidhimāsthāya rauhiṇaṃ tu na laṅghayet //
GSD36mvir_sau:8184: madhyāhnavyāpinī yā tu tithiḥ pūrvā parāpi vā /
GSD36mvir_sau:8185: tasyāṃ pitṛbhyo dātavyaṃ hāsavṛddhī na kāraṇam //
GSD36mvir_sau:8202: prātaḥkāle tu na śrāddhaṃ prakurvīta dvijottamaḥ /
GSD36mvir_sau:8204_1: śrāddheṣu prātaḥ kālasya niṣedhāttadatiriktapūrvāhṇo daivikaśrāddhakālaḥ tadvyāptyaiva pūrvavannirṇayaḥ /
GSD36mvir_sau:8205: viśeṣastu yadā vṛddhikṣayādibhirdinadvaye 'pi tulyakālā karmakālavyāptistadottaraiva grāhyā /
GSD36mvir_sau:8206: udite daivataṃ bhānau pitrye cāstamite ravau /
GSD36mvir_sau:8216: āvartanaṃ nāma dinamadhyaṃ tathā ca āvartanāvadhikaḥ pūrvo bhāgaḥ pūrvahṇastadavadhikaḥ paro bhāgo 'parāhṇa ityarthaḥ /
GSD36mvir_sau:8225: pūrvāhṇo vai devānāṃ madhyandino manuṣyāṇāmaparāhṇaḥ pitṝṇāṃ tasmādaparāhṇe dadātīti /
GSD36mvir_sau:8226_1: pramāṇāntarāpratītatvātpūrvāhṇe devebhyo dadāti madhyandine manuṣyebhya iti vidhī kalpyete iti /
GSD36mvir_sau:8229: pūrvāhṇaḥ prathamaḥ prokto madhyāhnastu tataḥ paraḥ //
GSD36mvir_sau:8235: pūrvāhṇaḥ praharaṃ sārddhaṃ madhyāhnaḥ praharaṃ tathā /
GSD36mvir_sau:8238: pañcadhā vibhāgadyotikā śatapathaśrutiḥ--ādityastveva sarva ṛtavaḥ sa yadaivodetyatha vasanto yathā
GSD36mvir_sau:8239: saṅgavo 'tha grīṣmo yathā madhyandino 'tha varṣā yadāparāhno 'tha śaradyadaivāstametyatha hemanta iti /
GSD36mvir_sau:8248: ahno muhūrtā vijñeyā daśa pañca ca sarvadāṃ /
GSD36mvir_sau:8250: ahnastriṃśadghaṭīparimitatve nyūnādhikatve vā muhūrtāḥ pañcadaśaiveti sarvadetyasyārthaḥ /
GSD36mvir_sau:8252: raudraḥ śvetaśca maitraśca tathā sārabhaṭaḥ smṛtaḥ /
GSD36mvir_sau:8264: madhyāhno 'pi tridhāvibhāge pañcamuhūrtaparimitaścaturdhāvibhāge praharapa rimitaḥ pañcadhāvibhāge trimuhūrtapāramita iti trividhaḥ /
GSD36mvir_sau:8271: ete ca pūrvāhṇādayastu tattatkarmasu yathāviniyojakaṃ yathālābhaṃ grāhyā yavabrīhyādivat /
GSD36mvir_sau:8275: kuṃ yatra gopatirgobhiḥ kārtsnyena tapati kṣaṇe /
GSD36mvir_sau:8276: sa kālaḥ kutapo jñeyastatra dattaṃ mahāphalam //
GSD36mvir_sau:8280: sarvapṛthivītāpakatvaṃ khamadhyagatasya sūryasya bhavatīti tadupalakṣitaḥ kālaḥ kutapaśabdenocyata ityarthaḥ /
GSD36mvir_sau:8285: sa kālaḥ kutapo jñeyaḥ pitṝṇāṃ dattamakṣayam //
GSD36mvir_sau:8288: tilā darbhāśca madhyāhno navaite kupāḥ smṛtāḥ //
GSD36mvir_sau:8299: rātrau śrāddhaṃ na kurvīta rākṣasī kīrttitā hi sā /
GSD36mvir_sau:8311: caturthe prahare prāpte śrāddhaṃ tatra na kārayet /
GSD36mvir_sau:8316: yattvatra śūlapāṇyādibhiruktaṃ na vikalpabhiyā paryudāsāṅgīkaraṇaṃ vidhiniṣedhayoḥ sāmānyaviśeṣarūpatvena tulyabalatvābhāvāt tadaprasakteḥ,
GSD36mvir_sau:8321: eteṣāṃ ca paryudāsatvam amāvāsyāvidhiśeṣatayā rātryādītarāmāvāsyāyāmi ti śūlapāṇiḥ /
GSD36mvir_sau:8327: te hi ahorātraṃ vinā karmakaraṇāśaktestadvadahorātraparā bhavanti /
GSD36mvir_sau:8331: purāṇeṣvapi ca“adya janmāṣṭamīṃ prāpya“iti sahkalpavākyaṃ sāvanadinasya vidhiṃ sūcayati /
GSD36mvir_sau:8333: nanu paryudāsasyāpi paryudasanīyaprāptisāpekṣatvātsarvaśrāddheṣu ca pūrvāhṇāparāhṇāditattadvelānāṃ niyatatvena rātryādiprāptyabhāvātkathamete paryudāsā iti cet,
GSD36mvir_sau:8346: darśaprakaraṇagatasyāpi ca niṣedhasya prakaraṇe niveśāmbhavādutkarṣa iti kecit /
GSD36mvir_sau:8348_1: sāmānyataḥ prāpnoti na tu grahaṇādivattatpuraskārema vidhirastīti tatra vikalpaprasattyabhāvātsa
GSD36mvir_sau:8351: ityādivacanaṃ tadapi vāśabdopanibandhādvacanāntaraparyudastaparātreranyatra prāptaprātassāyāhnādigauṇakālasyāpi mukhyatvadyotanārthaṃ na punā rātrāvapi tatkartavyatāparamityāhuḥ /
GSD36mvir_sau:8352_0: apare tu prakaraṇābādhe sambhavati tadvādhasyāyogātprakṛtāveva daivānmānuṣādvā pratibandhādasamāpte
GSD36mvir_sau:8352_1: śrāddhe yadi ravirastamiyāttadā prārabdhatvādrātrāvapi tatsamāpane prasakte na naktaṃ
GSD36mvir_sau:8353: tathā ca sāmikṛtameva sthāpayitvā paredyuḥ kṛtvātatsamāpanīyaṃ yajamānenāpi ca taduttarameva bhoktavyam /
GSD36mvir_sau:8356: vastutastu aparāhṇādividhayo na niyamārthāḥ kintu prāśastyātiśayārthāḥ /
GSD36mvir_sau:8358: aparāhṇe pitṝṇāṃ tu tatra dānaṃ praśasyate //
GSD36mvir_sau:8360: ataśca teṣāmaniyatatvāttatra sarvabelānāṃ prasaktau yukte rātriparyudāsaḥ /
GSD36mvir_sau:8369: vidhijño vidhimāsthāya rauhiṇaṃ tu na laṅghayet //
GSD36mvir_sau:8375: dināṣṭamabhāgāntyamuhūrtayoḥ punarniṣedhāt na tu sarvathā vihitatvameva rātriprātaḥ kālavat /
GSD36mvir_sau:8380: bhavatu vā ekodiṣṭavṛddhyādiṣu madhyāhnaprātarādiśrutirniyamārthā aparāhṇaśrutistu pārvaṇe pūrvodāhṛtavākyaiḥ prāśastyātiśayārthaiva /
GSD36mvir_sau:8382: atra ca pārvaṇasyāparāhṇakālatve 'pi prārambhaḥ kutapa eva /
GSD36mvir_sau:8383: ahno muhūrtā vijñeyā daśa pañca ca sarvadā /
GSD36mvir_sau:8384: tatrāṣṭamo muhūrto yaḥ sa kālaḥ kutapaḥ smṛtaḥ //
GSD36mvir_sau:8391: etasyāpi ca vikṛtibhūte pārvaṇe vyavasthā smaryate mārkaṇḍeyena--
GSD36mvir_sau:8393: kṛṣṇapakṣāparāhṇe tu rauhiṇaṃ tu na laṅghayet //
GSD36mvir_sau:8396: idaṃ hi vacanaṃ śuklapakṣasambandhināṃ yugamanvādisāṃvatsarikādīnāṃ sarveṣā sarvasya prayogasya pūrvāhṇakālatvaṃ kṛṣṇapakṣasambandhināṃ cāparāhṇakālatvaṃ na vidadhāti /
GSD36mvir_sau:8398: naca kṛṣṇapakṣāṃśe 'nuvādaḥ śuklapakṣāṃśa eva tu prakṛtiprāptāparāhṇabādhenaiva pūrvāhṇavidhiriti vācyam /
GSD36mvir_sau:8400_1: ca taduttarabhāgasya pakṣabhedenopakramakālatvavyavasthāpanamevānena vākyena kriyata iti siddham /
GSD36mvir_sau:8402: dve śukle dve tathā kṛṣṇe yugādī kavayo viduḥ /
GSD36mvir_sau:8413: evamāmaśrāddhaṃ tu pūrvāhne ityatrāpi sa eva /
GSD36mvir_sau:8417: ayaṃ cāmaśrāddhe pūrvāhnavidhirdvijātikarttṛkāmaśrāddha eva na tu śūdrakarttṛkāmaśrāddhe 'pi /
GSD36mvir_sau:8430: vacanaṃ tu yadi sākaraṃ tadā sarvatrāmaśrāddhe pūrvāhṇavikalpitaṃ kālāntaraṃ vidhattāṃ na tu śūdrāmaśrāddhe kaścidviśeṣaḥ /
GSD36mvir_sau:8434: atra ca prātaḥkālaḥ pañcadhāvibhāgena pakṣāntareṣu prātarvibhāgābhāvāt /
GSD36mvir_sau:8435: yastu tredhācaturdhāvibhaktadinādyabhāgayorapi kvacitprātaḥśabdaprayogaḥ sa gauṇa ityuktaṃ parvanirṇaye /
GSD36mvir_sau:8450: na coktavacane niṣedhānupapattiḥ tasya samūlatve vikalpenopapatteriti, tanna /
GSD36mvir_sau:8453: naca tripiṇḍapadena piṇḍamātravidhānaṃ tritvaṃ tu avayutyānuvāda iti vācyam /
GSD36mvir_sau:8454: bhavanmate niṣedhavākyasya nirmūlatvena piṇḍadānarūpaprākṛtāṅgasya punārvidhāne pūrvatvāpatteḥ /
GSD36mvir_sau:8455: piṇḍadānasya prādhānyapakṣe tu tasya śrāddhapadenaiva siddheḥ punarvidhāne
GSD36mvir_sau:8457: na ca niṣedhasya samūlatvāṅgīkāreṇaiva pākṣikatvopapādanārthaṃ piṇḍadānavidhiriti vācyam /
GSD36mvir_sau:8470: bharaṇīṣu ca kurvīta piṇḍanirvapaṇaṃ na hi /
GSD36mvir_sau:8474: asyāṃ śrāddhaṃ kṛtaṃ yena sa gayāśrāddhakṛdbhavet //
GSD36mvir_sau:8488: ityādīni śrāddhaniṣedhakāni vacanāni tadekavākyatayā śrāddhaniṣedhakāni vyākhyeyānīti kecit /
GSD36mvir_sau:8489: vastutastu hemādrau tithau vāre ca śrāddhasya bihitatvāttatprayuktaśrāddha eva piṇḍadānaniṣedhaḥ /
GSD36mvir_sau:8519: śāstraprāptasya piṇḍadānasya niṣedhe“natau paśau karoti“iti vadvikalpāpatteḥ /
GSD36mvir_sau:8522: atra hi anekāni śrāddhāni ekasmin vākye upādāya piṇḍadānaniṣedhaḥ śṛyamāṇo na tattacchrāddhaprakaraṇe paṭhita iti vaktuṃ śakyate /
GSD36mvir_sau:8526: ityādivākyeṣu smṛtyantaravihitaśrāddhānuvādena na piṇḍadānaṃ paryudatyate yenoktadoṣāvakāśaḥ syāt kintu apūrvakarmotpattiḥ kriyate /
GSD36mvir_sau:8536: pañcadaśyāṃ ca bho vīra! meṣasaṅkramaṇe tu vā //
GSD36mvir_sau:8545: māsaṃ samagraṃ parayā bhattyā snāyīta kārttike //
GSD36mvir_sau:8558: darśaṃ vā paurṇamāsīṃ vā prārabhya snānamācaret /
GSD36mvir_sau:8567: caitre māsi mahābāho! puṇyā pratipadā purā /
GSD36mvir_sau:8569: na tasya duritaṃ kiñcinnādhayo vyādhayo nṛpa! /
GSD36mvir_sau:8572: kārttikāśvayuje māsi caitre vāpi tathā nṛpa! //
GSD36mvir_sau:8578: āśvine māsi vai pūṇyā dvitīyā śuklapakṣagā /
GSD36mvir_sau:8594: māghe māsi tṛtīyāṃ guḍasya lavaṇasya ca /
GSD36mvir_sau:8595: dānaṃ śreyaskaraṃ rājan! strīṇāṃ ca puruṣasya ca //
GSD36mvir_sau:8599: śivā śāntā sukhā rājan! caturthī trividhā matā /
GSD36mvir_sau:8600: māsi bhādrapade śuklā śivā lokeṣu pūjitā //
GSD36mvir_sau:8601: māsi māghe tathā śuklā yā caturthī mahīpate! /
GSD36mvir_sau:8602: jñeyā sā śāntidā nityaṃ śāntiṃ kuryātsadaiva tu //
GSD36mvir_sau:8603: yadā śuklacaturthyāṃ tu vāro bhaumasya vai bhavet /
GSD36mvir_sau:8604: tadā sā sukhadā jñeyā sukhānāmeti kīrttitā //
GSD36mvir_sau:8614: śuklā mārgaśire puṇyā śrāvaṇe yā ca pañcamī /
GSD36mvir_sau:8618: yeyaṃ bhādrapade māsi ṣaṣṭhī tu bharatarṣabha! /
GSD36mvir_sau:8631: māsi bhādrapade śuklā saptamī yā gaṇādhipa! /
GSD36mvir_sau:8633: yā tu mārgaśire māsi śuklapakṣe tu saptamī /
GSD36mvir_sau:8634: tadā sā kathitā vīra! sarvānandakarī śubhā //
GSD36mvir_sau:8653: tasyāṃ snānaṃ prakurvīta dānaṃ caiva viśeṣataḥ //
GSD36mvir_sau:8656: tasyāṃ vratādi kurvāṇo labhate vāñchitaṃ phalam //
GSD36mvir_sau:8663: caitre trayodaśī puṇyā tasyāṃ daśaguṇaṃ phalam /
GSD36mvir_sau:8668: māghasya kṛṣṇapakṣe yo dāne bahuphalā hi sā //
GSD36mvir_sau:8691: śuklapakṣe tu saptamyāṃ yadā saṅkramate raviḥ /
GSD36mvir_sau:8694: sarveṃ koṭiguṇaṃ proktaṃ bhāskarasya vaco yathā //
GSD36mvir_sau:8706: pauṣe māsi yadā devi! aṣṭamyāṃ yamadaivatam /
GSD36mvir_sau:8708: tadā sā tu mahāpuṇyā jayantī cāṣṭamī smṛtā /
GSD36mvir_sau:8719: nāmnā sā vijayā khyātā tithīnāmuttamā tithiḥ //
GSD36mvir_sau:8720: yo dadāti tilaprasthaṃ prāpya kālaṃ tu vatsaram /
GSD36mvir_sau:8726: hastayuktā tu vaiśākhe jyeṣṭhe tu svātisaṃyutā /
GSD36mvir_sau:8727: jyeṣṭhayā tu tathāṣāḍhe mūlopetā tu vaiṣṇave //
GSD36mvir_sau:8729: tathā bhādrapade māsi śravaṇena ca saṃyutā /
GSD36mvir_sau:8737: māghyāṃ tu samatītāyāṃ śravaṇena tu seyutā /
GSD36mvir_sau:8738: dvādaśī yā bhavet kṛṣṇā proktā sā tilavaiṣṇavī //
GSD36mvir_sau:8755: mahatī pūrṇamāsī sā yuktā pūrṇendunā gurau //
GSD36mvir_sau:8758: paurṇamāsī tu mahatī proktā saṃvatsare tu sā /
GSD36mvir_sau:8762: pūrṇimā jīvavāre tu mahacchabdā hi sā tithiḥ //
GSD36mvir_sau:8764: harikṣetre ca gaṅgāyāṃ sāmudre naimiṣe tathā /
GSD36mvir_sau:8767: aindre guruḥ śaśī caiva prājāpatye ravistathā /
GSD36mvir_sau:8768: pūrṇamāsī tu sā jñeyā mahājyaiṣṭhīti kīrttitā //
GSD36mvir_sau:8770: āgneyaṃ ca yadā ṛkṣaṃ kārtikyāṃ tu bhavetkvacit /
GSD36mvir_sau:8772: yadā yāmyaṃ bhavedṛkṣaṃ puṇyaṃ tasyāṃ tithau kvacit /
GSD36mvir_sau:8774: prājāpatyaṃ yadā ṛkṣaṃ yadā tasyāṃ narādhipa! /
GSD36mvir_sau:8776: mande vārke gurau vāpi vāreṣveteṣu ca triṣu /
GSD36mvir_sau:8777: trīṇyetāni ca ṛkṣāṇi proktāni vrahnaṇā svayam //
GSD36mvir_sau:8785: meṣasthasca yadā sauriḥ siṃhe ca gurucandramāḥ /
GSD36mvir_sau:8786: bhāskaraḥ śravaṇākhye tu mahāmāghī tu sā smṛtā //
GSD36mvir_sau:8791: amā somena bhaumena guruṇā raviṇā tathā /
GSD36mvir_sau:8797: amāvāsyā yadā puṣye raudrarkṣe vā punarvasau /
GSD36mvir_sau:8801: māghāsite pañcagaśī kadācidupaiti yogaṃ yadi vāruṇena /
GSD36mvir_sau:8802: ṛkṣeṇa kālaḥ sa paraḥ pitṝṇāṃ na hyalpapuṇyairnṛpa! labhyate 'sau //
GSD36mvir_sau:8813: divaiva yogaḥ śasto 'yaṃ na tu rātrau kadācana /
GSD36mvir_sau:8820: kapilāṃ ca dvijāgryāya dattvā kratuphalaṃ labhet //
GSD36mvir_sau:8822: bhādramāsyasite pakṣe bhānau caiva kare sthite /
GSD36mvir_sau:8823: pāte kuje ca rohiṇyāṃ sā ṣaṣṭhī kapilābhidhā //
GSD36mvir_sau:8827: ayaṃ ca yadā sampūrṇaḥ tadaiva puṇyaḥ /
GSD36mvir_sau:8829: saṃyoge tu caturṇāṃ tu nirddiṣṭā paraṇeṣṭhinā /
GSD36mvir_sau:8832: amāvāsyā tu somena saptamī bhānunā saha /
GSD36mvir_sau:8840: ekādaśyāṃ site pakṣe puṣyarkṣaṃ yadi jāyate /
GSD36mvir_sau:8843: śukle vā yadi vā kṛṣṇe caturthī vā caturdaśī /
GSD36mvir_sau:8848: rātrau snānaṃ na kurvīta dānaṃ caiva viśeṣataḥ /
GSD36mvir_sau:8849: naimittikaṃ ca kurvīta snānaṃ dānaṃ ca rātriṣu //
GSD36mvir_sau:8852: madhyaṃ dine 'rdharātre ca śrāddhaṃ bhuktvā tu sāmiṣam /
GSD36mvir_sau:8858: tatra siṃhārke śuklacaturthyāṃ candradarśanaṃ na kāryam /
GSD36mvir_sau:8866: ṣaṣṭhīṣu tailaṃ palamaṣṭamīṣu kṣaurakriyāṃ caiva caturdaśīṣu /
GSD36mvir_sau:8871: saptamyāṃ na spṛśettailaṃ nīlavastraṃ na dhārayet /
GSD36mvir_sau:8872: na cāpyāmalakaiḥ snānaṃ na kuryātkalahaṃ naraḥ //
GSD36mvir_sau:8881: atra sannihitaṃ pāpaṃ taile māṃse bhage kṣure //
GSD36mvir_sau:8885: iti smaraṇāt tato 'nyatra doṣābhāva iti, tanna /
GSD36mvir_sau:8888: tailaniṣedhe ca sarvatra tilatailasyaiva niṣedhaḥ tailapadasya tatraiva
GSD36mvir_sau:8894: caturdaśī aṣṭamī ca amāvāsyā ca pūrṇimā /
GSD36mvir_sau:8903: parvasu nādīyīta na māṃsamasnīyāt parvasu hi rakṣaḥpiśācavyabhicārivīnnatambinīti /
GSD36mvir_sau:8908: tailaṃ māṃsaṃ vyavāyaṃ ca kṣuraṃ caiva vivarjayet //
GSD36mvir_sau:8911: bhage māṃse kṣure taile nityaṃ tiṣṭhati parvasu //
GSD36mvir_sau:8914: patraṃ vā pāṭayetteṣāṃ brahmahatyāṃ sa vindati //
GSD36mvir_sau:8925: vasyā vāsyā vasī vāsī amāpūrvā ameti ca /
GSD36mvir_sau:8936: māse nabhasyamāvāsyāṃ darbho grāhyo navaḥ smṛtaḥ /
GSD36mvir_sau:8939: kuśāḥ śākaṃ ca puṣpāṇi gavārthe ca tṛṇādikam /
GSD36mvir_sau:8946: amāvāsyāsu sarvāsu navaṃ vastraṃ na dhārayet /
GSD36mvir_sau:8960: vastraṃ ca pīḍayennaiva kṣureṇāpi na hiṃsyate //
GSD36mvir_sau:8961: hemādrau tu caturthacaraṇe kareṇāpi hi budhyate iti pāṭhaḥ /
GSD36mvir_sau:8963: tailaṃ na saṃspṛśedāmaṃ vṛkṣādīn chedayenna ca /
GSD36mvir_sau:8964: pakṣādau ca ravau ṣaṣṭyāṃ riktāyāṃ ca tathā tithau //
GSD36mvir_sau:8974: nandāsu nābyaṅgamupācareta kṣauraṃ ca riktāsu jayāsu māṃsam /
GSD36mvir_sau:8975: pūrṇāsu yoṣit parivarjanīyā bhadrāsu sarvāṇi samārabheta //
GSD36mvir_sau:8977: nābhyaṅgamarke na ca bhūmiputre kṣīraṃ ca śukre ca kuje ca māṃsam /
GSD36mvir_sau:8978: budhena yoṣā na samācareta śeṣeṣu sarvāṇi sadaiva kuryāt //
GSD36mvir_sau:8979: citrāsu haste śravaṇeṣu tailaṃ kṣīraṃ viśākhāpratipatsu varjyam /
