GSD36mvir_sau:9773: satyaṃ, naikamātrakālabādha iti, kintu somādhānayordvayorapi kālo bādhyate /
GSD36mvir_sau:9776: ata eva“yadaivainaṃ yajña upanamedathādadhīta“iti bhāradvājena nakṣatrādyanādara ukto yakṣyamāṇatvābhisandhimata iti na kiñcidanupapannam /
GSD36mvir_sau:9777: uttarāyaṇaṃ sarvamādhānakāla ityuktamācāryairityuktaṃ baudhāyanabhāṣye keśavasvā minā /
GSD36mvir_sau:9780: apare tu smārttatvenāsya smārttādhāna evopasaṃhāro na śrautādhāna iti vadanti /
GSD36mvir_sau:9781: etacca malamāsādiṣu tathā guruśukramauḍhyādiṣu na kāryam /
GSD36mvir_sau:9788: ayanam ayanaṃ pratīti pratyayanaṃ pratidakṣiṇāyanaṃ pratyuttarāyaṇaṃ cetyarthaḥ /
GSD36mvir_sau:9794: āpastambaḥ--saṃvatsare saṃvatsare yajeta ṣaṭsu ṣaṭūsu vā māseṣvityeke /
GSD36mvir_sau:9797: tena varṣāntare ādhānadivasa ityartha ityeke bhāṣyakṛtaḥ /
GSD36mvir_sau:9799: “upapadavibhakteḥ kārakavibhaktirbalīyasī“ityanuśāsanāt saṃvatsarasyaivādhikaraṇatve tatra ca kadetyapekṣite ṛtuvyāvṛttāvityekaḥ suvayasa ityapara iti kāladvayam /
GSD36mvir_sau:9800: ṛtuvyāvṛttau = rsavatsaramadhye yasmin kasmiṃścit ṛtuvyāvṛttidina ityarthaḥ /
GSD36mvir_sau:9802: bhāṣyakāramate ṛtuvyāvṛttau pratiṛtuvyāvṛttāvevaṃ saṃvatsare ṣaṭ iti pakṣāntaraṃ suyavasa iti ca pakṣāntaraṃ svatantrameva saṃvatsarapakṣāditi /
GSD36mvir_sau:9804: ṣaṭsu ṣaṭsu māseṣu iti ca pakṣāntaram /
GSD36mvir_sau:9806: keṣāṃcinmate tu ṣaṇmāse ityetatpakṣe āvṛttimukha iti yojayanti /
GSD36mvir_sau:9807: evaṃ ca bhāṣyakāramate pratisaṃvatsaramādhānadina ityekaḥ pakṣaḥ, ādhānadināt ṣaṭsu
GSD36mvir_sau:9812: keṣācinmate tu saṃvatsare saṃvatsare iti pakṣe yasmin kasmiṃścidṛtāvekaḥ,
GSD36mvir_sau:9814: ṣaṭsu ṣaṭsu māseṣ iti pakṣe ca āvṛttimukha iti tṛtīya iti /
GSD36mvir_sau:9817: kātyāyano 'pi kāladvayamāha--paśvijyā saṃvatsare saṃvatsare prāvṛṣi āvṛttimukhayorveti /
GSD36mvir_sau:9818: kālāntaramāha baudhāyanaḥ-paśubandhena yajetetyupakramya āmāvāsyena vā haviṣeṣṭvā nakṣatre veti /
GSD36mvir_sau:9820: apare tu śuklapakṣaḥ sampūrṇa iti āhuḥ /
GSD36mvir_sau:9822: athavā na kṣīyate candramā asminniti nakṣatraṃ paurṇamāsītyartha iti /
GSD36mvir_sau:9823: etanmate paurṇamāsyāṃ darśapaurṇamāsa prayogārambhātpaurṇamāsīmārabhya darśaparyantaṃ na karmāntarārambhaḥ,
GSD36mvir_sau:9825_1: ādhānadivasātsaṃvatsaramadhye yasmin kasmiṃścitparvaṇi paśuḥ kārya iti ṣaṣṭhaṃ kālamāha /
GSD36mvir_sau:9826: eṣa ca puśurnityaḥ“saṃvatsare saṃvatsare“iti pratyayanamiti ca vīpsāśravāt,
GSD36mvir_sau:9830: tatra cāturmāsyāni kartavyānītyuktaṃ yājñabalkyena--cāturmāsyāni caiva hīti /
GSD36mvir_sau:9833: tāni ca yāvajjīvikaprayogavanti, saṃvatsaraprayogavanti, dvādaśāhaprayogavanti ceti trividhāni /
GSD36mvir_sau:9835: tatra saṃvatsaraprayogavantyapi dvividhāni, ṛtakuyājikalpena cāturmāsyayājikalpena ceti /
GSD36mvir_sau:9837: eteṣāṃ prayogāṇāṃ bhede ca pramāṇaṃ vakṣyamāṇatattatkālavidhita evāvaseyam /
GSD36mvir_sau:9841: tatra sāṃvatsarikaprayoge ṛtuyājikalpe vaiśvadevādikāla ukta āpastambena /
GSD36mvir_sau:9842: vasante vaiśvadevena yajate prāvṛṣi varuṇapraghāsaiḥ śaradi sākamedhairiti vijñāyate /
GSD36mvir_sau:9843: atra triṣu parvasu niyataḥ kāla uktaḥ /
GSD36mvir_sau:9844: śunāsīrīye tu ṛtuyājisaṃjñānurodhācchiśira eva grāhya iti pratibhāti /
GSD36mvir_sau:9847: anekeṣu kāleṣu satsvapi“ityanena bhāradvājavacanenoktasya tasyābādhenaivopapattau bādhakalpanāyogāt /
GSD36mvir_sau:9848: cāturmāsyayājikalpe tathā yāvajjīvaprayoge 'pi kāla uktenaiva yaścaturṣu caturṣu māseṣu yajate sa cāturmāsyayājī /
GSD36mvir_sau:9849: tatrāpi niyamamāha-phālgunyāṃ paurṇamāsyāṃ caitryāṃ vā vaiśvadevena yajeta /
GSD36mvir_sau:9850: tataścaturṣu māseṣu āṣāḍhyāṃ vā śrāvaṇyāṃ varuṇapraghāsairyajeta /
GSD36mvir_sau:9851: tataścaturṣu māseṣu pūrvasmin parvaṇyupakramya dvyahaṃ sākamedhairyajeta /
GSD36mvir_sau:9852: tato dvyahetryahe caturahe 'rddhamāse māli caturṣu vā māseṣu śunāsīrīyairiti /
GSD36mvir_sau:9853: atra yadā phālgunyāmupakramastādāṣāḍhyāmityādi, yadā caitryāṃ tadā śrāvaṇyāmiti /
GSD36mvir_sau:9855: ṛtuyājipakṣādayameva bhedo yadṛtuyāji pakṣe vasantānte vaiśvadevairiṣṭvā prāvṛḍādyaparvaṇi varuṇapraghāsānuṣṭhānamapi sambhavati /
GSD36mvir_sau:9856: cāturmāsyayājipakṣe caturṣu caturṣu ca māseṣviti niyama iti /
GSD36mvir_sau:9858_0: tatra bhāradvājaḥ--dvādaśāhāni yakṣyamāṇaḥ pratipadi vaiśvānarapārjanyābhyāṃ dvitīye
GSD36mvir_sau:9858_1: vaiśvadevena tṛtīye caturthe voparamya pañcame varuṇapraghāsaiḥ ṣaṣṭhe saptame voparamyāṣṭame
GSD36mvir_sau:9858_2: navame vā sākamedhairdaśame ekādaśe voparamya dvādaśe śunāsīrīyayā,
GSD36mvir_sau:9859: trayodaśe paśuriti saṃvatsarapratimā vai dvādaśa rātrayaḥ saṃvatsarameva yajeteti vijñāyate /
GSD36mvir_sau:9860: trayodaśe paśuriti yadi paśunā samāptistatpakṣe bodhyam /
GSD36mvir_sau:9861: atra dvitīyādipadāni dvitīyāditithiparāṇi pratipadīti upakramāt spaṣṭe coktaṃ baudhāyanena--
GSD36mvir_sau:9862: dvādaśāhe 'pi cāturmāsyairyajetātha prathamāyāṃ vaiśvadeveneṣṭvā caturthyāṃ varuṇapraghāsairaṣṭamyāṃ navamyāṃ ca sākamedheḥ dvādaśyāṃ śunāsīrīyaiḥ puruṣo yajeteti vijñāyata iti /
GSD36mvir_sau:9865: nakṣatre prayoga ityeka āhurūdagayana āpūryamāṇapakṣe puṇyāhe prayuñjīteti /
GSD36mvir_sau:9866: atra pakṣe āpūryamāṇasya pakṣasya puṇyanakṣatre upakramaḥ /
GSD36mvir_sau:9870_0: kathamu khalu yāvajjīvaprayuktānāṃ cāturmāsyānāmanuprayogo bhavatīti phālgunyāṃ vā
GSD36mvir_sau:9870_1: caitryāṃ vā paurṇamāsyāṃ śunāsīrīyapuruṣo ya jetātha vaiśvadevāyopavaset vaiśvadeveneṣṭvā
GSD36mvir_sau:9870_2: paurṇamāsavaimṛdhābhyāṃ yajetātha cediṣṭayā paśunā somena vā yajeta kathaṃ tatra
GSD36mvir_sau:9870_3: kuryāditi pratikṛṣyaitasya pakṣasya śunāsīrīyapuruṣo yajetaiṣāmekena yajetātha vaiśvadevāyopavaset
GSD36mvir_sau:9871: atho etadbaudhāyanasya pakṣaṃ vedayante yāvjajīvikānyeva cāturmāsyāni syuriti /
GSD36mvir_sau:9873: atra yadā phālgunyāṃ pūrvasaṃvatsare upakramastadā phālgunyāṃ yadā caitryāmupakramastadā caitryāmiti /
GSD36mvir_sau:9874: atha cediṣṭhyeti yadi prayogasamāptyarthaṃ iṣṭyādi kriyate tadāyaṃ kramaḥ /
GSD36mvir_sau:9876: atho etadbaudhāyanasyetyādyuttyā ca yāvajjīvikaprayogo 'pi pākṣiko bodhyaḥ /
GSD36mvir_sau:9879: yathāprayogamiti yāvatā kālena prayogasamāptirbhavati tāvati kāle santataṃ pūrvāhnādau kuryāditi /
GSD36mvir_sau:9882: na hi yathāprayogamityanena cāturmāsyakālavidhānaṃ kintu brahmacaryakālasya niyamaḥ prayogadinamitaiva vratacaryeti /
GSD36mvir_sau:9885: yāvajjīvaprayuktānyeva cāturmāsyāni syurantaramithunāni prathame tveva saṃvatsare vrataṃ caredityatrohasmāha śālākiḥ sāṃvatsarikānyeva cāturmāsyāni brahmacaryavantīti /
GSD36mvir_sau:9890: śālikimate tu sāṃvatsarikeṣve vāyaṃ niyamo na yāvajjīvikeṣu /
GSD36mvir_sau:9893: apare tu māstu yathāprayogamityataḥ santatakaraṇaṃ tathāpi“udagayana āpūryamāṇapakṣe samastāni“iti bhāradvājavacanātsamastānāṃ saṃlagnānāṃ prayoga iti /
GSD36mvir_sau:9898: ayamapi darśapaurṇamāsottaraṃ kartavya ityuktaṃ“darśapaurṇamāsābhyāmiṣṭvā somena yajeteti vacanāt /
